Farac is 43 years old and married, with two  children.  He is an IDP person, and he is living in the Sabirabad region with his family. 

He was unemployed for several years, so to improve his situation, he started a farming business 12 years ago. Now this is the main source of income for his family. 

Raising and selling fresh fruits and vegetables brings a stable income and is in high demand among the Azerbaijani people. Fresh vegetables are good for national dishes like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are favorites for punch. Farac usually sells his crops in the central bazaar, and his profit per month is AZN 180. 

Farac decided to expand his business. For this purpose, he has applied for a AZN 2,000 loan. He will buy seeds and fertilizer to increase his crops and cover his customers' demand. 

This is Farac's fourth loan, and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to  buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Adalat

texts.en:
Adalat is a 44-year-old married man with three children. He has been breeding livestock from a very young age thanks to his father, who taught him well. He already has 10 years of experience. During these years, Adalat has acquired the knowledge and skills required for the business.

He purchases calves in the central livestock market and raises them. After fattening the animals, he resells them for a profitable price in a livestock bazaar. Meat is in very high demand in Azerbaijan, and people use it in everyday dishes, such as Pilau and Dolma.

His business requires a lot of physical strength as Adalat spends most of his time in the open air. His wife helps him feed the animals.

His monthly income is 150 AZN, and Adalat wishes to increase it. As meat is in high demand, he needs more capital to put in his business to cover the market. For this purpose, he applied for 1,500 AZN. He will use the loan to buy two cattle, one dairy cow, and a fodder. This will be his third loan and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to buy two cattle, one dairy cow, and a fodder.

loans.name: Vahid

texts.en:
Vahid is 43 years old and a married man with two children. He is a market vendor, and sells different kinds of goods, such as flour, beverages, macaroni, butter, and candies. He has 20 years of experience, and has a deep knowledge of the market and the demands of his clients.

This year, he decided to start his own second business. Now, he is a farmer and is raising seasonal fruits and vegetables. He chose this business because it is profitable and fresh crops are in high demand. 

Vahid needs a loan 500 AZN to buy different fruit trees. He hopes that only Kiva will help him .

loans.use: to buy different fruit trees.

loans.name: Alim

texts.en:
Alim is a 28-year-old, young married client from Sabirabad region. He is a farmer and has raised seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last four years. During these years, Alim gained enough skills and experience to run the business. He chose this crop business because it is profitable and fresh fruits and vegetables are in high demand. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them healthy. Many national dishes are made of vegetables, like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits are served at every table in an Azerbaijan family and also are used in fresh punch. 

Alim usually sells his crop in the central bazaar. His monthly income is 100 AZN. As these products are in high demand, Alim wants to expand his business and produce more fruits and vegetables to cover market demand. For this purpose, he applied for 1,000 AZN. He will buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers. This is going to be his second loan.

loans.use: to buy new garden tools, seeds and fertilizers in order to expand his business.

loans.name: Elvin

texts.en:
Elvin is a 22-year-old student at Tefekkur University. Elvin studied well in high school and hopes that he can also successfully graduate from university and become a good specialist. He is planning to work in his field after graduation to start helping his parents financially. 

His parents are currently facing a financial crisis, which does not allow them to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he applied for a loan 2,000 AZN. He awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Perviz

texts.en:
Perviz is a 21-year-old student at Tefekkur University.  Perviz’s father is an employee in the public sector, and his is the only source of income for the family. His father can't pay the university installments for his son because of high family expenses, so Perviz needs a loan 2,000 AZN.

This loan will help him to pay the university installments for this semester so he can complete his studies. This will insure him a better life in the future.

loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Shola

texts.en:
Shola is 51 years old. She has four children who study at secondary school in different grades. Shola is an IDP (internally displaced person), and she lives in the Sabirabad region with her family. She is a Lacin refugee. Shola is a housewife and farmer. All of her children help out with the farming, supporting their parents by carrying out various daily activities like cleaning, spreading fertilizer, applying liquid plant food, etc. 

Shola completed a primary level of education, thanks to the efforts that her parents made when she was young. She is a very family-oriented, hardworking, and humble woman. She works to take care of her children and husband, supporting them every day by preparing their meals, etc. Her dreams are to support her children in their studies, and to see them graduate from university. She hopes to give them a better quality and style of life. Shola is therefore requesting a loan of 1200 AZN to purchase supplies like fertilizers, liquid plant food, etc. to maintain her fruit crops. This will allow her to have an excellent harvest and to then successfully sell her products at the market.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for fruit crops, such as fertilizers, liquid plant food, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a large quantity of clothes to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Tamaraneh Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) is very pleased to present to you members of the "Tamaraneh" group for the second time. Having finished repaying their last Kiva loan very successfully, they are requesting a new loan of 3,300,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL). With the help of this new loan, they will be able to further add more inventory to their respective businesses.

 Adama remains the featured leader of this group. She is again going to use her share of the loan to buy bales of used clothes to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy a bale of used clothes to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru: Милая женщина в красно-желтом платье это Хосият, ей 59 лет. А рядом с ней ее дочь Сарвиноз. Сарвиноз разведена, и с тремя детьми живет у Хосият. Сарвиноз недолго работала в школе уборщицей из-за того что у нее нет паспорта и ее официально не приняли на работу. Сарвиноз умеет шить и хочет развиваться в этом плане. Тогда она сможет брать заказы для шитья. Из-за отсутствия паспорта и других документов Сарвиноз не может получить кредит, поэтому ее мама Хосият берет кредит, чтобы купить дочери швейную машинку. У Хосият не хватает средств для такой покупки. Она пенсионерка и тоже не работает. Поэтому для их семьи этот кредит очень важен. Помогите им!
texts.en: The lovely woman in the red and yellow dress is Khosiyat.  She is 59 years old. Next to her is her daughter Sarvinoz. Sarvinoz is divorced, has three children and lives with Khosiyat. Sarvinoz briefly worked as a janitor at the school because she had no passport and was not officially hired. Sarvinoz knows how to sew and wants to become better at this craft. Then, she would be able to take sewing orders. Because she does not have a passport and other documents, Sarvinoz cannot obtain a loan, so her mom Khosiyat has requested a loan to buy her daughter a sewing machine. Khosiyat does not have the means to make such a purchase. She is retired and does not work. Because of this, the loan is very important to their families. Help them!

loans.use: to obtain a sewing machine for her daughter

loans.name: Bankoama Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Bankoama” group. They are small-scale businesswomen based in Koidu, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. 

They are requesting  a loan of SLL 1,000,000 for each member of the group in order to further expand their respective businesses. 

The featured leader of this group is Kumba.  Kumba is 37 years old; she was born in Gbane, a village in eastern Sierra Leone. She is married to a trader, and the couple has eight children, who are attending primary and secondary school. 

Kumba has been a businesswoman for five years now. She sells rice, flour, palm oil, pepper, salt, etc. Kumba has requested this loan in order to buy the above-mentioned items in bulk.

loans.use: to buy rice, flour, palm oil, pepper, salt, etc. in bulk to add to her current stock

loans.name: Sagrado Corazon Group

texts.es:
El grupo Sagrado Corazon está en su 4to ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, además ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, con el cual quieren saber la situación en la que cada una se encuentra y así poder trabajar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ada, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir está en un nivel medio de ingresos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropas y con ese trabajo está ayudando a su familia, está generando los ingresos para poder luchar día a día y así tratar de que no les falte nada. Quiere seguir creciendo y es por eso que se está esforzando al máximo.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas de verano y así seguir luchando y esforzándose por su familia. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe, que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The "Sagrado Corazón" ("Sacred Heart") group is in its fourth cycle of the women's committee program. They form part of the poverty elimination program with which they want to know the current situation of each member and work together in this way.

One of the members is Ada who showed a poverty level of two in her survey, meaning that she is within the average income level. She makes a living selling clothing. With this work she is supporting her family and generating an income to fight each day and make sure that they do not go without. She wants to continue expanding and it is for this reason that she is working as hard as she can. 

She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of a variety of summer clothing in order to continue fighting for her family. She is thankful for this opportunity because it will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to buy a variety of summer clothing.

loans.name: Gulchera

texts.ru: Гулчере 43 года. Она начинающая предпринимательница. Гулчера планирует начать свой бизнес по купле и продаже скотов. Она вперед продумала свой бизнес план. Единственным ограничением для нее это нехватка средств. Гулчера запаслась сеном на зиму и построила кров для скотов. И теперь она решила реализовать свои идеи с помощью кредита. Тогда она обеспечится своим бизнесом и хорошим доходом. Она не боится получить огромный объем работы, ведь ей всегда поможет ее муж и сын. Муж Гулчеры работает водителем грузовой машины. Другой сын работает заграницей. У Гулчеры есть 3 дочери. Они будут очень рады, если у их мамы будет бизнес, и они ей помогут. Сумму кредита она потратит для закупа скотов. Для начала малое количество, но в будущем надеется на расширение своей деятельности.
texts.en: Gulchera is 43 years old. She is starting out as an entrepreneur. Gulchera plans to start a business buying and selling cattle. She has planned out her business plan in advance. Her only restriction is the lack of funds. Gulchera has stocked hay for the winter and built a shelter for cattle. Now, she has decided to realize her ideas with the help of a loan. Then she will be provided with a good business and a good income. She is not afraid to do a large amount of work, because she can always get help from her husband and son. Her husband works as a cargo truck driver. Another son is working abroad. Gulchera has 3 daughters. They will be very happy if their mother has a business, and they would help her. She will use the loan to purchase cattle. She will start with a small amount, but hopes to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock in order to start a business

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred  is 42 years old and lives in the town of Bugiri in the  region of Uganda. He is married and has six children with three of them currently in school. For the past eight years, Fred  has been working hard to manage his retail shop. 

To help expand his business, Fred  has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to increase his stock, and will help Fred  to generate greater profits and create employment opportunities for the family members. Fred  hopes that in the future he will be able to have a sustainable business. 

Fred  is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Fred  who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for micro-loans.

loans.use: to increase his inventory

loans.name: Zokirjon

texts.ru: Зокирчону 25 лет. Он холост. У Зокирчона не полное высшее образование. Он не нашел работу в своем селе Хамадони, поэтому решился на создании своего бизнеса. Зокирчон хочет заняться животноводством. Для такого бизнеса у него имеются все условия - имеет коровник, сено и другие  виды корма, благоприятный и чистый воздух Таджикистана. Только у Зокирчона не хватает начального капитала для создания бизнеса. Он просит помочь закупить несколько голов крупнорогатого скота, чтобы они стали основоположниками в его бизнес. Зокирчон надеется на успех своего нового бизнеса!
texts.en: Zokirjon is 25 years old. He is single.  Zokirjon did not complete a higher education. He did not find work in his village Hamadon, and so decided to create his own business. Zokirjon wants to raise livestock. He has all the necessary conditions for this business - a barn, hay and other feed, and the pleasant and clean air of Tajikistan. The only thing he lacks is start-up capitol to create a business. He has asked for help to buy a few heads of cattle, so that they become the foundation of his business. Zokirjon hopes his new business will be successful!

loans.use: to purchase cattle in order to start a livestock business

loans.name: Firuzakhon

texts.ru: Фирузахон 23-летняя молодая женщина. Она живет с родными в селе района Хуросон. Фирузахон работает в дехканском хозяйстве и одновременно занимается животноводством. Она замужем и у нее есть сын. В купле-продаже скота ей помогает муж, а за скотом она ухаживает сама. Фирузахон сейчас имеет одну дойную корову, которая обеспечивает ее годовалого ребенка молоком. Фирузахон хочет купить еще несколько коров, чтобы увеличить поголовья скота в своем скотном дворе. Чтобы совершить данную покупку она просит кредит. Фирузахон надеется, что ей помогут, и она купит коров.
texts.en: Firuzakhon is a young woman, 23 years old. She lives with her family in a village in Khuroson. Firuzakhon works in an orchard and raises livestock. She is married and has a son. Her husband helps her buy and sell livestock, and she takes care of the cattle herself. Firuzakhon now has a dairy cow that provides milk for her one-year-old child. Firuzakhon wants to buy a few more cows to so she will have more livestock in her barnyard. She is asking for a loan to make this purchase. Firuzakhon hopes that you will help her so she can buy a cow.

loans.use: buy cattle for breeding.

loans.name: Sobir

texts.ru: Собир заботливый семейный человек. Ему 39 лет. У него три сына и две дочери, которым с 4 по 14 лет. Его жена не работает, она ухаживает за детьми и домом. Собир как глава семьи сам обеспечивает семью. Он подзарабатывает мастером, предоставляющим услуги по ремонту квартир. Это сезонная работа и с наступлением холодов у него совсем не бывает заказов и его семья остается без источника дохода. Собир долго планировал и наконец решился начать новый бизнес. Его всегда интересовало животноводство. Ведь это прибыльный бизнес и не требует больших усилий. Собир во дворе дома построил сарай для содержания скота и запасся сеном и кормом для скота. Теперь, чтобы приобрести сам скот, ему не хватает финансовых средств и поэтому он обратился за кредитом. Собир на сумму от кредита хочет закупить молодых бычков и телят, и начать свой бизнес по откорму и продаже скота. Он ждет поддержки.
texts.en: Sobir is a caring family man. He is 39 years old. He has three sons and two daughters who are aged from four to 14. His wife does not work; she looks after the children and the home. Sobir as head of the family supports the family on his own. He works part-time as an artisan, offering services in apartment repair. This is seasonal work and with the onset of cold weather he will have nearly no orders and his family is left without a source of income. Sobir planned for a long time and finally decided to start a new business. He was always interested in raising livestock. After all, this is a lucrative business and does not require much effort. In the yard of his home, Sobir has built a shed for keeping cattle and stocked it with hay and cattle feed. Now, in order to purchase himself cattle, he does not have the financial means and therefore he requested a loan. With the sum of the loan, Sobir wants to buy young bulls and calves, and to start his own business fattening and selling cattle. He is awaiting support.

loans.use: A loan of $1,050 helps Sobir to buy young bulls and calves in order to start a business in fattening and selling cattle.

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Даврону 43 года. Он женат. У него есть 2 детей. Они все вместе живут в городе Худжанд. Там же Даврон работает. Он работает мастером отдельщиком. Он делает ремонты в квартирах и в домах по заказу. В соответствии того что зимой очень холодно, жители ремонтируют дома только летом. У Даврона сезонная работа, поэтому зимой у него отсутствует доход. Он хочет взять в аренду маленькое помещение и там предоставлять жителям Худжанда услуги по прошивке мобильных телефонов. Прошивка для мобильников нужна для восстановления программ на телефоне и защита от вирусов. Такой процесс проводится с помощью компьютеров или ноутбуков. Поэтому он просит кредит, чтобы приобрести ноутбук.
texts.en: Davron is 43 years old. He is married. He has two children. They all live in the city of Khujand. This is also where Davron works. He works as a master finisher. He does repairs in apartments and homes on order. Because of the fact that winter is very cold, people repair their homes only in the summer. Davron has seasonal work, therefore in winter he has no income. He wants to rent a small room and there to offer residents of Khujand services for mobile phone firmware. Firmware for mobile phones is needed to restore the programs on the phone and virus protection. This process is carried out with the help of a computer or laptop. Therefore, he is asking for a loan to acquire a laptop.

loans.use: A loan of $650 helps Davron to purchase a laptop.

loans.name: Abduqodir

texts.ru:
Абдукодир военнослужащий в отставке. Он 20 лет служил во благо своей Родины. Абдукодир вышел на пенсию с высоко поднятой головой со званием полковника. Сейчас ему 60 лет. Он отец пятерых детей и дед. Он со своей большой семьей живет в районе Хамадони.  
   Абдукодир на данный момент нигде не работает. Он решил начать свой бизнес по купле и продаже крупнорогатого скота. Сейчас он строит коровник, чтобы его будущие животные не мерзли зимой. Чтобы приобрести нужное количество скота для бизнеса, нужна определенная сумма. У Абдукодира нет достаточного капитала, чтобы совершить такую покупку. Поэтому он просит кредит. Помогите Абдукодиру начать бизнес!
texts.en:
Abduqodir is a retired veteran. He served his country for 20 years. Abduqodir retired at the rank of colonel, with his head held high. Now he is 60 years old. He is the father of five children and is a grandfather. He lives with his large family in the region of Hamadoni.

Abduqodir currently doesn't work. He decided to start his own business buying and selling cattle. He is currently building a barn so that his future animals won't feel cold in the winter. To acquire the right amount of livestock for his business, he needs a certain amount of money. Abduqodir doesn't have sufficient capital to accomplish such a purchase. For that reason, he is applying for a loan. Please help Abduqodir start his business!

loans.use: To start an animal production business and to purchase cattle

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru: Эту 22-летнюю молодую женщину зовут Манзура. Она замужем за Дилшода и проживает с ним и его семьей в районе Шахритус. У них пока нет детей. Манзура работает на половину дня в местной школе учительницей. Сейчас она хочет дополнительно открыть собственный бизнес. Ее интересует сфера торговли. Манзура уже приобрела точку продажи на рынке и хочет заняться продажей фруктов. На этот шаг ее подтолкнуло стремление улучшить качество жизни. Ведь торговый бизнес считается прибыльным бизнесом, приносящим ежедневную выручку. Манзура запрашивает в кредит 950 долларов США, чтобы закупить сезонные фрукты, в частности гранат, яблоки, виноград, бананы и другие и начать торговлю. Она надеется на вашу отзывчивость.
texts.en: This 22-year-old young woman is named Manzura  She is married to Dilshoda, and lives with him and his family in the Shahrituz region. They do not yet have children. Manzura works for a half-day in a local school as a teacher. Now, she wants additionally to open her own business. She is interested in the trade sphere. Manzura has already purchased a point of sale and wants to engage in selling fruits. This step pushed her drive to improve her quality of life. Since trade is a profitable business, generating a daily profit. Manzura is requesting a loan of US$950, in order to buy seasonal fruits, in particular pomegranates, apples, grapes, bananas, and others, and to start trading.

loans.use: A loan of $950 helps Manzura to buy seasonal fruits to start a trade business.

loans.name: Magloria

texts.es: Magloria tiene 41 años, es divorciada madre de 3 pequeños hijos que viven con ella en su casa hecha a base de material noble. Se dedica integralmente a la agricultura y producción de frutos rentables de su zona como el cacao, café, barbasco y palillo. Se inició hace más de 20 años junto a su esposo y apoyada por sus padres con dinero para la compra de su parcela. Años después se separó y asumió el doble rol para sus hijos sintiéndose muy motivada por esta gran oportunidad. Su parcela esta ubicada a 30 minutos de su localidad donde debe realizar una caminata para llegar y realizar sus labores cotidianas tales como la limpieza y mantenimiento de sus plantaciones, para ello cuenta con el apoyo de trabajadores ya que es una labor complicada y colectiva. Los frutos que logra obtener a fin de cada campaña son vendidos en su localidad a los acopiadores del lugar donde logra recuperar el dinero que suele invertir cada campaña. Uno de sus principales objetivos a largo plazo es poner una tienda de productos comestibles en su vivienda esperando obtener ingresos adicionales a su labor. Este es el segundo préstamo que solicita a su entidad financiera y se caracteriza por ser una socia muy responsable. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de herramientas y plantas de almácigo para seguir con su labor agrícola.
texts.en: Magloria is 41 years old. She is the divorced mother of 3 young children who live with her in her house built from brick. She works in farming and grows products that are profitable in the area, such as cacao, coffee, barbasco and turmeric. She started with her husband 20 years ago and with her parents' help with money to buy her parcel of land. Years later, she separated and took on a double role for her children, feeling very motivated by this great opportunity. Her land is located 30 minutes from her community and she walks there to do her daily work such as weeding and maintaining the plants. For this she has the help of some workers, since it is a complicated and collective job. The products she is able to obtain with each cycle are sold in her community to the local warehouses where she collects her money and invests in each crop. One of her main objectives for the long term is to open a store for edible products in her house, hoping to bring in income apart from her labor. This is the second loan she has asked her financial entity for and she is described as being a very responsible member. At this time, she hopes to have 1,000 nuevos soles to buy tools and seedling plants to continue with her agricultural work.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and farm tools.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es: Maritza, de 50 años, está casada con Marcos, sus hijos ya son independientes por eso vive solo con su esposo en su casa propia. Maritza, tiene como actividad diaria la venta de productos comestibles en su tienda instalada en la parte frontal de su vivienda, atiende a sus clientes todos los días desde muy temprano, ofrece a la venta artículos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, pan, huevos, leche, aceite, condimentos, accesorios, entre otros. Lleva en este negocio 10 años y le va muy bien, atiende con ayuda de su esposo. Está contenta con su trabajo ya que le genera el dinero necesario para solventar los gastos de su familia, además del contacto con el público que le hace sentir muy bien. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2800, por lo tanto agradece a todas las personas que siguen confiando en ella para seguir adelante. Con el monto solicitado comprará los principales abarrotes de consumo diario que pone a la venta en su pequeña tienda como arroz, azúcar, pan, huevos, leche, aceite, condimentos y otros.
texts.en:
Maritza, 50, is married to Marcos and their children are independent now so she only lives with her husband in the house they own.  Maritza’s daily activity is selling food items in her store located in the front part of her house.  She tends to customers every day starting very early.  She sells basic staple goods like rice, sugar, bread, eggs, milk, oil, condiments and accessories, among others.  She’s been in business 10 years and does very well; her husband helps her run the store.  She’s happy with her work because it generates money needed to cover family expenses and the contact she has with the public makes her feel very good.

On this occasion she will request 2,800 soles and she thanks all the people who continue having confidence in her so she can continue moving forward.  She will use the requested amount to buy the main daily consumption grocery items like rice, sugar, bread, eggs, milk, oil, condiments and others she sells in her small store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Marizol

texts.es:
Marizol es una joven de 19 años, está casada con Rolando de 26 años quien es padre de su pequeño hijo de 1 año.
Vive en una casa construida a base de material noble. Su principal actividad económica es la agricultura que desarrolla con su esposo hace más de 3 años porque fue un oficio que aprendió desde niña inculcada por sus padres y las buenas ganancias que son posible de percibir. Cuando se inicio no tenía un terreno propio ya que alquilaba a sus vecinas para cada campaña logrando con el tiempo y esfuerzo adquirir un terreno de 2 hectáreas en donde se inició con mucha ímpetu. Actualmente sus terrenos están repleto de árboles cacaoteros que mantienen en buen estado y fertilizándolo con abonos orgánicos como guano de aves y otros. Periódicamente suele contratar a trabajadores del lugar para tareas complicadas como el retiro de maleza y principalmente en la cosecha.  Uno de sus objetivos a largo plazo es de trabajar y brindarle a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y educación académica firme. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y agradece por la oportunidad que la brinda a ella y muchos agricultores de su zona. En está oportunidad desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para realizar algunas mejoras en sus terrenos y contratar trabajadores que le ayudaran en las labores de deshierbo.
texts.en:
Marizol, 19, is married to Rolando, 26, the father of her year-old little boy.  She lives in a house made of quality materials.

Marizol's main job is agriculture, which she and her husband have done for more than three years.  It's a job she learned from her parents at a very young age, and it's possible to earn good profits.  She didn't have her own land when she started because she rented from her neighbors every season.  Over time and with effort she was able to acquire two hectares of land where she started with a lot of momentum.

Currently Marizol's land is full of cacao trees that she keeps in good condition, fertilizing them with organic soil amendments such as bird guano and other things.  Periodically she hires workers from the area for complicated tasks such as weeding and harvesting.  One of her long-term goals is to work and give her son a good quality of life and a solid education.

This is her first Kiva loan and she's grateful for the opportunity it gives her and other farmers in her area.  Currently she wants to have 1,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to make some improvements on her land and to hire workers to help her with the weeding tasks.

loans.use: to take care of her crops and to hire workers

loans.name: Kelly

texts.es:
Kelly, de 49 años de edad, es una mujer alegre y entusiasta.  Es docente de profesión, actualmente ejerce su profesión, paralelo a esto se dedica a la venta de perfumería. Está separada, vive en su casa propia con sus padres, sus 02 hermanos, su hijo mayor de edad y una visita que está alojada temporalmente. El trabajo de Kelly consiste en la venta de perfumes, los cuales compra por catálogo y los vende personalmente a sus amistades y conocidos dándoles a crédito hasta por 15 días. Se dedica  a ésta actividad  hace más de 05 años y le va muy bien, lo cual lo realiza  sola. Considera rentable su negocio por la demanda que tiene de sus productos y las buenas ganancias que le deja. Le gusta su trabajo pues le da un ingreso extra y así mejora su economía , le deja tiempo libre y le ha permitido hacerse conocida en el circulo social que se desenvuelve. 
Considera rentable ésta actividad por que tiene varios pedidos y sus clientes le son fieles llegándole a comprarle periódicamente sus productos. Este es el sexto préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el préstamo solicitado de 2500 nuevos soles, comprará por catálogo perfumes de diversas presentaciones en mayor volumen y a menor precio.
texts.en: Kelly is 49, a very joyful and enthusiastic woman.  She is a teacher that currently works in her profession, in addition to this she sells perfumes.  She is separated, lives at her own house with her parents, her two brothers, her oldest son and a visitor that is living there temporarily.  Kelly's business consists in the sale of perfumes, she buys them through catalog and sells them personally to her friends and acquaintances giving them credit for 15 days.  She has done this activity for more than 5 years and it's going really well, she does this alone.  She considers that her business is profitable because of the demand her products have and the got earnings she makes.  She likes this work because it leaves an extra income for her and this way she improves her economy, gives her some free time and allows her to be a known person in the social circle that she is part of.  She considers the business profitable because she has several orders and has loyal clients who buy her products periodically.  This is the 6th loan with Kiva and she is thankful for the financial support she gets to keep going, she also commits to make her payments punctually.  With the loan requested of 2,500 PEN she will buy perfumes through catalog of different presentations at higher volume and lower price.

loans.use: To buy perfumes at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es: Maura tiene 50 años, es divorciada y madre de 2 hijos de 1 y 17 años. Vive en su casa propia hecha de material noble que construyo con el fruto de muchos años de trabajo. Su principal oficio es la agricultura que desempeña hace más de 40 años en su terreno de 3 hectáreas. Cuando se inició contaba con el firme apoyo de su esposo durante muchos años hasta que se separó por diversas razones y desde entonces manteniente su hogar de manera independiente trabajando en sus cultivos. Posee plantaciones de cacao orgánico y barbasco que viene cultivando con mucha dedicación y brindándole los cuidados necesarios. Suele invertir en cada campaña productiva adquiriendo abono orgánico para obtener mejores resultados. Asimismo suele también contratar trabajadores del lugar para realizar tareas de deshierbo logrando así optimizar su producción. Uno de sus principales objetivos a largo plazo es adquirir un terreno adicional y ampliar sus plantaciones de barbasco ya que es también considerado un producto muy rentable. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente muy contenta por tener un medio para obtener dinero e invertir en sus terrenos. En esta oportunidad desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para comprar abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Maura is 50 years old. She is divorced and has two children, ages 1 and 17. She lives in her own home, which is made of good quality materials and was constructed with a lot of hard work over the course of many years. Her main profession is agriculture, which she has been doing for more than 40 years on her 3-hectare plot of land. When she began this job, she had the full support of her husband for many years, until they separated for many different reasons. Since then, she has supported her household on her own by working with her crops.

She has fields of organic cacao and varbasco (a vine used in fishing), which she has been cultivating with a lot of dedication and providing with all of the necessary care. During the productive seasons, she usually invests money in the purchase of organic fertilizers so that she can obtain better results. At the same time, she usually hires local workers to perform tasks like weeding so that she can optimize her production. 

One of her main long-term goals is to purchase additional land and increase her varbasco fields, since it is considered a very profitable product. This is her second loan with Kiva and she is very happy to have a way to receive money to invest in her fields. This time, she hopes to receive 1,000 nuevos soles to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Teodosia

texts.es:
Teodosia tiene 54 años, esta casada con Cayo y tiene 1 hijo de 21  años. Vive en su casa propia hecha con bloques de adobe. Se dedica a la agricultura de productos como el cacao, barbasco; entre otros.
Se inició hace más de 40 años junto a su esposo ya que era el único oficio que aprendió desde niña por parte de sus padres. Posee un terreno de 3 hectáreas que trata de mantener en buen estado con el firme apoyo de su esposo y de trabajadores que contrata para el retiro de maleza y otras tareas colectivas como la cosecha o traslado de los pesados sacos hasta los centro de venta en su localidad.
Suele usar abono orgánico para fertilizar sus cultivos y mejorar la calidad de sus productos.
Se siente muy identificada con su labor y  dentro de sus objetivos a largo plazo está la construcción de su vivienda a base de material noble. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para seguir invirtiendo en sus terrenos con la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Teodosia is 54 years old, married to Cayo, and has a 21-year-old son.  She lives in a house that she owns, which is made of adobe bricks.  Teodosia makes a living in agriculture, growing products such as cacao, barbasco, and more.

Teodosia started this work over 40 years ago with her husband.  This is the only trade that Teodosia learned from her parents as a girl.  Teodosia has a three-hectare plot of land.  She tries to keep it in good condition with the steady support of her husband and of labourers who they hire to remove weeds and to do other work, such as collecting the harvest or carrying the heavy bags to where Teodosia sells the products.

Teodosia usually uses organic manure to fertilise her crops and improve the quality of her products.

Teodosia enjoys her work.  One of her long-term goals is to build a house with strongermaterial.  This is Teodosia's first Kiva loan and she is grateful for the financial support that she is receiving in order to get ahead.  Teodosia promises to make her repayments on time.  On this occasion Teodosia is applying for 1000 Nuevo Soles in order to continue investing in her land by buying organic manure.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Vitmer

texts.es:
Vitmer es un joven de 27 años comprometido y sin hijos de por medio. Vive junto a su pareja en su casa hecha a base de material noble. Inicialmente se dedicaba a actividades agrícolas en el terreno de sus padres pero con el poco tiempo optó por dedicarse al transporte de pasajeros entre las zonas rurales de su región logrando progresivamente obtener ingresos  y comprar su propio vehiculo el cual le permitió dejar los vehículos que rentaba para desempeñar su oficio. Le agrada mucho recorrer las distintas zonas de su región aunque en muchas ocasiones a tenido desperfectos de su vehiculo a mitad de camino, es por ello que trata siempre de contar con dinero para realizar diversos mantenimiento correctivos y preventivos de su unidad.
Desea seguir trabajando con la motivación que lo caracteriza y espera con el tiempo adquirir otra unidad para ponerlo en alquiler y percibir mayores ingresos. Asimismo ahorrar y cumplir su sueño de contar con su propia familia. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y espera contar con la confianza necesaria para seguir adelante.
Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 3,500 nuevo soles y realizar la reparación de su vehiculo de un problema que no le permite laborar con la fluidez que lo caracteriza.
texts.en:
Vitmer, 27, is a young engaged man with no children.  He lives with his fiancee in a house built of substantial materials.  Initially he worked doing agricultural work on his parents’ land but gradually over time decided to work providing passenger transportation services in the rural parts of his region progressively earning income and buying his own vehicle which made it possible for him to stop having to rent vehicles to provide this service.

He enjoys driving through the various zones in his region although he’s sometimes had vehicular breakdowns in the middle of the trip which is why he always tries to have money available to do the various repairs and preventive service the vehicle needs.

He wants to continue working with his characteristic motivation and hopes in time to acquire another unit to lease out and earn higher income.  He also wants to save to reach his dream of having his own family.

This is his first Kiva loan and he hopes to have your trust needed to continue moving ahead.  On this occasion, he’d like to have 3,500 new soles to repair his vehicle for it has a mechanical problem that keeps him from working with his characteristic smoothness.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia tiene  48 años, está casada con Patricio y tiene el agrado de tener a sus hijos ya mayores, trabajadoras y responsables. Vive en su casa construida a base de adobe. Anteriormente se dedicaba a las actividades agrícolas, no obstante con el paso de los años noto que ya no contaba con las mismas fuerzas y destreza que requiere este oficio. Esto la  motivo a iniciarse en un nuevo negocio como es  la elaboración de ropa tejida a base de lana. Lleva  casi medio año de trabajo y su talento para los tejidos le ha permitido convertir su negocio en una buena fuente de ingreso para su familia. Desea seguir con su negocio para el cual tiene planeado renovar los instrumentos que usa para la elaboración de las distintas prendas a base de lana.
Sus planes a futuro apuntan en abrir una tienda dedicada a la venta de ropa dentro de las cuales espera insertar las diversas prendas que ella elabora. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y agradece por la confianza que la brindan para seguir adelante. En está oportunidad desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de lanas para cumplir con unos pedidos pendientes y a la vez realizar la refacción de una de las dos maquinas de coser que posee.
texts.en:
Antonia, 48, is married to Patricio and glad that her children are all hardworking, responsible adults now.  She lives in her house made of adobe.  She used to work in agriculture but as time passed she noticed that she no longer had the same strength and dexterity that occupation requires.  

This motivated her to start a new business: making knitted wool clothing.  She’s been doing this for almost half a year and her talent for knitting has turned the business into a good source of income for her family.  She wants to continue with her business and she’s planned to renew her tools needed to make various wool-based clothes. Her future plan is to open a store to sell clothes among which she intends to include the ones she makes herself.  

This is her second Kiva loan and she’s grateful for the confidence place in her to continue moving forward.  On this occasion, she needs 2,000 new soles to buy wool to fill pending orders and also to repair one of her sewing machines.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Yuri

texts.es: Yuri tiene 21 años, está casado con Mardely con quien tiene el objetivo de tener hijos y formar una familia sólida a futuro. Vive junto a su esposa en su casa de material noble. Desde muy niño apoyó a sus padres en el campo y aprendió a cultivar y obtener ingresos gracias a la producción de cacao orgánico y otras plantas propias del lugar.  Al cumplir 18 años decidió independizarse y con motivo de apoyo sus padres le cedieron un terreno el cual empezó a cultivar con apoyo de su esposa y obtener ingresos propios. Su labor consiste en brindarle los cuidados necesarios a las plantaciones de cacao, café y barbasco que posee realizando tareas como el retiro de maleza, deschuponado y fertilizando sus terrenos de cultivo con abono orgánico. Desea trabajar con la motivación que siempre lo ha caracteriza y cumplir uno de sus primeros objetivos que es adquirir terreno más grande para poner mas cultivos de cacao y mejorar sus ingresos a futuro. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y agradece por la oportunidad que le brindan. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para comprar abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Yuri, 21, is married to Mardely.  His goal is to have children and form a solid family in future.   He lives with his wife in a house made of substantial materials.   Since childhood he helped his parents with the field chores and learned how to farm and earn income thanks to growing organic cocoa beans and other plants indigenous to the region.

When he turned 18 he decided to become independent and to help him do so his parents gave him a parcel of land that he and his wife started planting on to earn their own income.  His work consists in providing his cocoa bean, coffee and ‘barbasco’ [evergreen bush] crops with the necessary care doing chores like weeding, bud culling and fertilizing his land with organic manure.

He wants to work with the motivation that’s always characterized him and to reach one of his main goals which is to acquire a larger plot of land to grow more cocoa beans and improve his future income.

This is his first Kiva loan and he’s grateful for the opportunity he’s getting.   He wants to have 1,000 new soles to buy organic manure.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es:
Moises tiene 56 años, es viudo y padre de 3 hijos, vive junto al menor de sus hijos en su casa propia hecha con bloques de adobe. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy trabajador y ejemplo de padre en su comunidad.
Se dedica a la agricultura prácticamente desde muy pequeño y ha logrado tras la muerte de su esposa mantener económicamente a sus hijos hasta convertirlos en personas de bien. Comenta que cuando se inició en esta labor, los productos que solía producir no tenía una buena demanda por diversos factores, es por ello que desde muy joven solo lograba trabajar para su alimentación y gastos básicos. No obstante tras varios años después su región paso a convertirse en un buen proveedor de productos agrícolas que le permito a el y otros agricultores de su zona mejorar su situación económica. Su labor consiste en brindarle los cuidados necesarios a sus plantaciones de cacao ya sea solo o con la ayuda de trabajadores del lugar.
Tras una larga campaña productiva vende finalmente sus productos a los acopiadores de su zona esperando recuperar el dinero que suele invertir. Dentro de sus prioridades a largo plazo esta el de apoyar al ultimo de sus hijos hasta convertirlos en buenos profesionales. Es el primer préstamo que solicita a su entidad financiera y espera contar con la confianza necesaria. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 4,000 nuevos soles para la compra de un pequeño terreno de cacao, esperando así ampliar su producción.
texts.en:
Moises is 56 years old, a widower, and father to three children. He lives together with his youngest in his own house, made of adobe bricks. He is characterized as a very hardworking man and an exemplary father in his community.

He has worked in agriculture since he was very young, and after his wife's death he has been able to support his children financially and even to raise them to be good people. He says that when he began to do this work, the products he was producing were not in much demand due to various factors, and that this is the reason that since he was very young he has only managed to cover his food and basic expenses with his work. However, some years later his region became a source of agricultural products, which allowed him and other farmers in the area to improve their economic situations. His work consists of caring for his cocoa plantations as needed, either by himself or with help from local workers. After a long production period, he is finally selling his products to the local middlemen, and hopes to make back the money he invests.

A long-term priority for him is to support his children as much as possible so that they become good professionals. This is the first loan that he is requesting from his financial institution and he hopes to be trusted. He would like to have available 4000 PEN to buy a small cocoa field, and hopes that with this field he can increase his production.

loans.use: to buy a small field.

loans.name: Zosima

texts.es: Zosima es una mujer de 65 años, esta casada con Jesús y tiene el orgullo de haberle brindado a sus hijos todo el apoyo necesario para que sean personas trabajadoras y de bien. Vive junto a su esposo en su casa hecha de adobe. Se dedica a la agricultura hace más de 50 años cultivando varios de los productos mas rentables de su zona tales como el cacao orgánico, café, barbasco y otros. Se inició trabajando en otros terrenos de cultivo y gracias a ello compró su actual terreno de 3 hectáreas que le sirvió como principal sustento económico para mantener a sus hijos  durante muchos años. Le agrada mucho su trabajo y vivó prácticamente todos los años de su vida en el campo como una tradición familiar. Para obtener mejores ingresos cada campaña brinda el mejor de los cuidados a sus plantaciones de cacao y café manteniéndolos libre de maleza y fertilizando sus terrenos con abono orgánico. Suele vender sus productos a los centros de acopio de la ciudad ya que es donde le pagan buenos precios y logra recuperar así el dinero que suele invertir. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y agradece desde ya la confianza brindada. En está oportunidad desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Zosima, age 65, is married to Jesús.  She takes pride in having given her children all of the support needed for them to become hard-working, good people.  She lives with her husband in an adobe house.  She has been farming for over 50 years.  She grows several of the most profitable products in her area.  She grows things like organic cacao, coffee, barbasco, and others.

She started out working on other farm lands.  Thanks to this, she bought her current land, which is three hectares.  It served as the principal financial support for her children for many years.  She really likes her work.  She has lived almost all the years of her life in the field as this is a family tradition.

In order to get the best income every season, she provides the best care to her cacao and coffee plants.  She keeps them free of weeds, and she fertilizes her land with organic fertilizer.  She generally sells her products to the collection centers in the city because that is where they pay her the best prices.  She manages to recuperate the money that she generally invests.

This is her second loan with Kiva.  She is grateful for the trust placed in her.  This time she wishes to have 1,000 soles to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Aidee

texts.es:
Aidee, de 56 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, está casada y tiene 04 hijos que ya son mayores, de los cuales solo 02 de ellos viven a su lado en su casa propia. El trabajo de Aidee consiste en la venta de productos comestibles. Tiene su pequeño negocio en su casa, se dedica a tiempo completo a cumplir esta función y se siente muy contenta por sus ventas. Recibe el apoyo de su esposo y de sus hijos y eso le permite contar con el tiempo suficiente para realizar algunas funciones básicas en su hogar. Abastece su negocio de manera semanal comprando en los centros comerciales del centro de la ciudad. Lleva realizando su trabajo desde hace 05 años.
Le esta yendo bien ya que tiene buenos ingresos que le permiten pagar puntual sus cuotas, espera poder ampliar su negocio y empezar a ahorrar para invertir en mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y brindarles a sus hijos una mejor educación en una buena universidad. Este es su sexto préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
El monto solicitado de S/. 2000 soles lo invertirá en la compra de productos comestibles como arroz, azúcar, leche, huevos, aceites, plátano, cebollas, harina y otros productos.
texts.en:
Aidee, age 56, is a hard-working woman.  She is married, and she has four grown children.  Only two of the children live with her in her own house.  Aidee works selling food products.  She has her small business in her house.  She works full time on her business.  

She is very happy about her sales.  She receives help from her husband and her children.  This allows her to have enough time to do some basic household chores.  She stocks her business weekly by purchasing at the commercial centers in the center of the city.  She has been doing this work for five years.

It is going well for her because she has good income.  This allows her to make her payments punctually.  She hopes to be able to expand her business and to start saving in order to invest in improving her house and providing her children with a better education at a good university.

This is her sixth loan with Kiva.  She is grateful for the financial support that she is getting in order to get ahead.  She pledges to make her payments punctually.

She will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy food products like rice, sugar, milk, eggs, cooking oil, bananas, onions, flour, and other products.

loans.use: to buy food products like rice, sugar, milk, eggs, cooking oil, bananas, onions, flour, and other products.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth tiene 45 años, está casada con CHincc y tiene dos hijos que viven con ella en su casa hecha a base de material noble. Elizabeth se dedica a la agricultura y es una labor que desempeña hace más de 25 años, se inicio con ayuda de su esposo logrando adquirir hasta hoy 3 hectáreas de terrenos donde posee plantaciones de cacao y barbasco. Al empezar con este oficio de manera independiente logró aprovechar su juventud para trabajar de manera abnegada y lograr hasta hoy mantener sus cultivos en muy buen estado permitiéndole obtener almendras de cacao con calidad de exportación. Para desempeñar una campaña productiva debe necesariamente contar con capital para la compra de insumos tales como abono orgánico, herramientas y pago a los trabajadores que le apoyan en las distintas labores. Uno de sus principales objetivos es seguir trabajando con la motivación que la caracteriza para comprar un terreno de 1 hectárea y ampliar su producción de cacao para mejorar sus ingresos a largo plazo. Este es su segundo préstamo que solicita a su entidad financiera y se siente muy agradecida por la confianza y oportunidad que le brindan. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 45, is married to Chincc and has two children who live with her in her house made of quality materials.

Elizabeth has made a living in agriculture for more than 25 years.  She started with the help of her husband and at present has managed to acquire three hectares of land where she has cacao and barbasco crops.  When she began working on her own in this line of work she was able to make the most of her youth to work selflessly.

Elizabeth has been able to keep her crops in good condition, which allows her to produce export-quality cacao kernels.  To have a productive season she has to have the capital to buy supplies such as organic soil amendments and tools and to pay the workers who help her with a variety of tasks.  One of her main goals is to continue working with her characteristic motivation so she can buy one hectare of land to expand her cacao crop and, in the long run, improve her income.

This is Elizabeth's second loan from her financial institution and she's very grateful for their trust and this opportunity.  She wants 1,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy organic soil amendments.

loans.use: to buy organic soil amendments

loans.name: Nery

texts.es:
Nery tiene 45 años, es viuda y madre de 2 hijos de 11 y 12 años. Vive junto a sus hijos en su casa hecha a base de madera. Es una mujer que con mucha responsabilidad ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos a pesar de muchas adversidades. Se dedica a la agricultura cultivando alguno de los productos mas rentables de su zona tales como son el cacao orgánico, achiote entre otros. Se inició en esta labor junto a su esposo, pero tras su muerte realiza sus labores cotidianas con el apoyo de trabajadores que contrata para las tareas colectivas propios de su parcela. El terreno de 2 hectáreas que posee actualmente lo adquirió desde muy joven con la ayuda de sus padres y le sirvió mucho para obtener los ingresos necesarios y sustentar a su familia económicamente. Con el objetivo de obtener mejores ingresos fertiliza el suelo de sus terrenos de abono orgánico. Considera que lo mas complicado de su trabajo es trasladar los pesados sacos desde sus parcelas hasta los centros de transporte ya que el precio del transporte que circula por su comunidad es algo elevado. Este es el primer préstamo que solicita a Kiva y espera contar con la confianza necesaria porque lo considera un buen apoyo para invertir.
Desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para comprar abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Nery is 45 years old, a widow, and the mother of two children ages 11 and 12. She lives with them in her house made of wood. She is a very responsible woman and has managed to do well for her children despite many obstacles. 

She works in agriculture, cultivating some of the most profitable products of her area such as organic cacao and achiote, as well as others. She started out doing this work with her husband, but after his death she carried out her day-to-day work with the help of workers she hired to do the collective tasks on her plot. She currently has two hectares of land, which she acquired when she was young with the help of her parents. It is of great use to her in making the income she needs and supporting her family financially. 

With the goal of increasing her income, she fertilizes the land with compost. She considers the trickiest part of the job to be getting the heavy sacks from her plots to the transport centers, since the price of the transport that goes through her community is somewhat high. This is the first loan she is requesting with Kiva and she hopes to receive the necessary trust as for her it would be a great help and a good investment. She would like to have 1000 PEN to buy compost.

loans.use: to buy organic compost

loans.name: Edver

texts.es: Edver, de 20 años, es un hombre honesto y muy amable, está casado con Avila y es padre de un hijo de 07 meses de edad con quien vive en su casa propia. Edver se dedica a conducir su mototaxi, para eso sale a las calles de la ciudad en su vehículo en busca de sus eventuales pasajeros a quienes transporta dentro y fuera de la ciudad con bastante serenidad y tranquilidad ya que considera que la seguridad de sus pasajeros es lo más importante, de la misma manera siempre brinda su numero de celular para que pueda ser contactado por algún cliente que necesita de su servicio de. Lleva realizando estas actividades por 03 años y aunque al principio no le fue muy bien ahora afirma que esa situación ha cambiado y sus ingresos se han visto multiplicados gracias a las recomendaciones de cada uno de los clientes para quien ya trabajó. Ahora espera continuar trabajando y más adelante implementarse con más unidades de mototaxi para empezar a alquilarlos y generar sus ingresos económicos con mayor comodidad. Este es su segundo crédito con Kiva, por tanto agradece a quienes hacen posible su crédito para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado está muy comprometido una vez más a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado de S/. 1000 soles renovará el tapizado y algunos repuestos que su mototaxi necesita para estar en óptimas condiciones.
texts.en: Edver, 20, is an honest and very friendly man who is married to Avila and is the father of a seven-month-old son. They live in their own home. Edver earns his living as a motorcycle taxi driver. He drives the streets of the city in his vehicle in search of potential passengers whom he transports in and out of town with great serenity and calmness because he considers the security of his passengers with utmost importance. In the same way, he always gives his cell phone number so he can be contacted by a client who needs his service. He has been performing these activities for three years and, although at first he was not doing very well, he claims that his situation has changed and his income has been increased thanks to the recommendations of each of the clients for whom he worked. Now he hopes to continue working and later introduce more motorcycle taxis to start renting our to generate more income and be more comfortable. This is his second loan with Kiva. For this, he thanks those who make it possible for him to pursue his goals. He is committed once again to make timely repayments. With the requested amount of 1,000 Soles, he will renovate the upholstery and some parts of his motorcycle taxi so it is in top condition.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
Ronald es un joven de 26 años soltero y sin hijos que vive en su casa propia hecha de material noble.Desde que fue joven apoyaba a sus padres en las distintas tareas agrícolas que estos desempeñaban y logró así aprender un oficio para su sustento personal años después. Posee un terreno y medio de hectárea de cultivo que adquirió hace unos años con ayuda de sus padres y empezó a dedicarse con mucha fuerza con el único fin de brindarle mantenimiento y cuidado a sus plantaciones de cacao y barbasco logrando obtener buenos ingresos por la venta de estos.Lleva casi 7 años desempeñándose de manera independiente  y contando en ocasiones con el apoyo de trabajadores del lugar que son útiles para el retiro de maleza y similares.
Al igual que muchos agricultores en su zona hace uso constante del abono orgánico para fertilizar sus parcelas logrando así obtener una buena calidad de frutos para la posterior venta a los comprandores del lugar. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por al apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante.Desea en esta ocasión contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de sacos especiales para el envasado de cacao, así como la compra de abono orgánico para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Ronald is 26 years old, single, and has no children.  He lives in his own house made of fine material.  Since he was young, he has supported his parents in different agricultural work. He managed to learn these as a profession to support himself later in life.  

He has a plot and a half of land that he acquired a few years ago with the help of his parents.  He started working with a great deal of effort to maintain the land and care for the cocoa and barbasco plantations.  He wanted to obtain a good income from selling these. 

He has worked for 7 years independently, and sometimes counts on the assistance of workers to help remove weeds and similar things.  Like many agricultural workers in his area, he uses organic manure as fertilizer for the land.  With this he can obtain fruits of good quality to sell to local buyers.  

This is his second loan with Kiva and he feels very grateful for the financial support he has received to move his life forward.  This time, he is counting on 2,000 new soles to purchase special bags for the packaging of cocoa and well as purchasing organic fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: to purchase bags for cocoa beans and organic fertilizer

loans.name: Egnar

texts.es: Egnar, de 38 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora, es madre soltera, y tiene 04 hijos de 16, 07, 05 y 02 años de edad con quienes vive en su casa propia. Egnar se dedica a la venta de comidas como desayunos, menús y otros. Estableció su negocio en un espacio de su casa. Atiende principalmente por las mañanas, pero en ocasiones lo hace también por las noches. Sus clientes son transeúntes de la zona, vecinos y amistades, por fortuna su establecimiento tiene buena acogida gracias a la buena sazón de sus comidas. Lleva en este negocio cerca de 05 años, emprendió esta aventura gracias a un crédito financiero que obtuvieron, ahora trabajan junto a su mamá, atendiendo siempre de manera cordial. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual solventa los gastos de su hogar, pues ha tenido muchas necesidades económicas por los bajos ingresos cuando trabajaba de cocinera en un restaurante particular, pero ahora se siente más aliviada por desarrollar en su propia casa un oficio que le sirve de mucho. Este es el crédito número 05 con Kiva, por tanto agradece a quienes hacen posible su acceso a este financiamiento ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de forma puntual, del mismo modo se siente muy tranquila y respaldada por los integrantes de su banco comunal. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles comprará ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas tales como arroz, verduras, carnes, entre otros.
texts.en: Egnar, 38, is an enterprising and industrious woman. She is a single mother and has 4 children aged 16, 7, 5, and 2. They all live together in her own home. Egnar makes her living selling meals like breakfast, lunch, and more. She established this business in an area of her home. She mainly serves in the mornings but sometimes she works at nights. Her customers are pedestrians in the area, neighbors, and friends. Fortunately, the establishment is well-recieved thanks to the great flavor of her meals. She has been in business nearly 5 years. She undertook this venture thanks to a loan she obtained. She is now working alongside her mother, always serving in a cordial manner. She likes her business because it allows her to have an income which settles the household expenses since she has had many financial needs because of her low wages when she was working as a cook in a restaurant. Now she feels more relieved to develop a craft at home that will be a great help. This is her fifth Kiva loan. She thanks those who make it possible for her to access this funding as she will feel more secure in moving forward with her work. She agrees to comply with the payment of her debts in a timely manner. In the same way, she feels calm and supported by members of the community bank. With the requested amount of 1,000 PEN she will buy ingredients for preparing meals such as rice, vegetables, and meats, among others.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like rice, vegetables, and meats.

loans.name: Liseth

texts.es:
Liseth tiene 19 años, es madre soltera de su hijo de un año. Vive por el momento en casa de sus padres construida a base de madera. Se dedica al oficio de la agricultura hace 3 años. Con la llegada de su pequeño no tenía un oficio estable para mantenerse económicamente y fue por ello que recibió el apoyo de sus padres que le cedieron media hectárea de cultivo con plantaciones de cacao orgánico que empezó a trabajarlos de manera inmediata logrando obtener su primera producción en aquel entonces.
Es una labor que aprendió desde muy niña gracias a sus abuelos y debe de mantener los árboles en las mejores condiciones; es por ello que fertiliza sus terrenos de cultivo solo con abono orgánico.
Tiene la suerte de contar con parcelas de terreno muy fértiles que facilitan considerablemente su trabajo.
Desea con el tiempo reunir dinero mediante su humilde oficio para cumplir uno de sus principales objetivos que es adquirir un terreno y construir su propia vivienda. Es el primer préstamo que solicita a su entidad financiera y agradece desde ya la oportunidad que le brindan. En esta oportunidad desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico y herramientas para el buen mantenimiento de sus plantaciones de cacao.
texts.en:
Liseth is 19 years old. She is the single  mother of a one year old boy. Right now she is living in her parents' house, built from wood. She has worked in agriculture for 3 years. With the arrival of her little one, she didn't have a stable job to support herself financially and that is why she received her parents' help. They gave her a half hectare of of organic cacao crops and she started to work it, immediately obtaining her first harvest. 

She learned this work from the time she was very young, thanks to her grandparents, and she has to keep the trees in the best condition. That is why she only fertilizes her cropland with organic fertilizer. She is lucky enough to have very fertile land which facilitates her job considerably. In time, she hopes to get enough money together through her humble trade to meet one of her main goals, which is to acquire a plot of land and build her own house. This is the first loan that she has asked her financial institution for and she is grateful for the opportunity they are offering her. At this time, she wants to have 1,000 nuevos soles to buy organic fertilizer and tools to maintain her cacao crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and farming tools.

loans.name: Segismunda

texts.es:
Segismunda es una mujer de 54 años casada con Eulogio de 57 años con quien tuvo dos hijos que son hoy ya mayores y responsables.Vive junto a su esposo en su casa hecha a base de material noble. Desde que se comprometió empezó junto a su esposo a trabajar por el bienestar de su familia. Comenta que al inicio no fue nada sencillo mantenerse solo con los productos agrícolas que producían viéndose obligados a realizar la venta de frutas como plátanos, paltas y otros en la ciudad, no obstante con el paso de los años  el precio de estos productos han logrado un precio que fue beneficiando a los agricultores de cacao y productos similares en su zona. Suele realizar sus labores esperando brindarle el mantenimiento y cuidados necesarios a sus diversos árboles de cacao esperando a fin de campaña obtener una calidad deseada de sus mazorcas de cacao.
Trata siempre de usar solo abono orgánico para fertilizar sus terrenos. Uno de sus principales objetivos es poner una tienda productos comestibles en el primer piso de su vivienda porque es conciente que dentro de unos años no tendrá las mismas fuerzas para trabajar  con el mismo ímpetu que requiere su labor agrícola. Es el segundo préstamo que solicita a Kiva y se siente muy agradecida por la confianza que le brindan para seguir adelante. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 3,000 nuevos soles para comprar abono orgánico y plantas de almácigo.
texts.en:
Segismunda is a 54-year-old woman, married to 57-year-old Eulogio, and they have two children who are both responsible adults. She lives with her husband in her house, which is built from solid materials. Since the time she got engaged, she and her husband began to work for the wellbeing of their family. She says that at the beginning it was far from easy to support themselves only on their agricultural production, and that they had to sell fruit, including bananas and avocados, in the city. However, with the passage of time the products they produce have come to secure a price that is beneficial to those who grow cacao and other similar products in the area.

She works with the hope of providing appropriate care for her various cacao trees, so that at the end of the season she can obtain cocoa pods of desirable quality. She tries to use only organic fertilizers on her land. One of her main goals is to open a store of edible products in the first floor of her home because she knows that within several years she won't have the strength to work as vigorously as her agricultural labors require. 

This is the second loan she is requesting with Kiva, and she is very grateful for the trust placed in her so she can keep moving forward. She would like 3000 PEN to buy compost and seedlings.

loans.use: to buy compost and seedlings

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 31-year-old married man who works in selling men accessories, such as sunglasses, wallets, belts and watches since 2002. He started his current business in 2006 to increase his income and develop his family's living.

His business is located in a popular street. He doesn't have a shop at the meantime, but he hopes that in the coming future, he will be financially capable of opening a wide one.

Today, Mohamad is acquiring a loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, to increase his business merchandise with newly released items that will attract new customers and fulfill their needs.

loans.use: to increase his business merchandise (men accessories) with newly released items.

loans.name: Moyad

texts.en:
Moyad is a 26-year-old single man from Jenin city. He lives with his family in a small house. Moyad's brothers are workers and get low and unstable income. Moyad is a student in a local university where he studies Business Administration. 
Moyad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to register for this semester in the university. By applying this loan, Moyad will be able to finish his study and find a job in the future to help his family with their expenses. 
Moyad appears in the photo

loans.use: to register for this semester in the university.

loans.name: Majd

texts.en:
Majd is a 22-year-old single man from Tulkarem City. He lives with his parents in a small house in the city. For the past two years, Majd has been working in his blacksmith workshop. It is a good project and earns a good income. 
Majd took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy some raw materials and a new machine for his blacksmith shop. This will improve the workshop productivity and also his income will be improved. 
Majd appears in the photo while he was working

loans.use: to buy some raw materials and a new machine for his blacksmith shop.

loans.name: Hana

texts.en:
Hana is a 44-year-old married woman from a small village near Jenin city. She lives with her husband and his family in a humble house. and over the past years, Hana has been working at sewing clothes. She uses a small room in her home. It is a good business and since she is the only seamstress in her village, her customers are from her village and the villages nearby. 

Hana took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new sewing machine for her workshop. By applying this loan, Hana will be able to do her sewing work with a better quality. This will help her to improve her income.

Hana appears in the photo in her sewing workshop.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her business

loans.name: Bassam

texts.en:
Bassam is 35 years old and married, the father of two children.  He has been working as a security guard in a school since two years ago. 

His business isn't enough to cover his family's increasing needs.  That's why he is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to buy a small van to start a new business. He will turn it into a school bus, and he'll start transporting students from and to school as an additional income business.

Bassam hopes to provide his family the best education and living ever.

loans.use: to buy a small van to transport students to and from school

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 26-year-old married father of two children. He has been working as a coordinator in a reputable company since five years ago. His wife doesn't work; she takes full responsibility of taking care of her family's needs, which makes him the family's sole breadwinner.
 
Mohamad is acquiring a loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, to pay for his children's increasing school tuition fees. 
He hopes that in the future, he can establish his own business to improve his family's living.

loans.use: to pay for his children's school tuition fees.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is a 24-year-old single lady from a small village called Aroura near Ramallah City. She lives with her family in a small simple house. Nida finished her study recently and took a BA degree and she is now looking to find a job to help her family, but she has a health issue and she needs urgent surgery. Nida took a loan from FATEN to help her pay for the urgent stomach surgery. This will help her to live a normal life.
Nida appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay for urgent stomach surgery

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 28-year-old single man from Jenin city. He lives with his family in a very simple house. Ahmad works as an employee in a restaurant in the city, and this is the only source of income for the family. Ahmad also is a student at the university where he studies English. He has had a very financial bad financial situation and he could not finish his study on time. 
Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help to buy a new laptop. This laptop will help him to write the reports and do his homework. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to finish his study and gain a BA degree and find a better job in the future.
Ahmad appears in the photo with his laptop

loans.use: to buy a new laptop

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco habita en casa muy humilde junto a su grupo familiar conformado por su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos de 9 años, 7 años, 3 años y una hija de 11 años de edad. Desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la agricultura principalmente  a la siembra de maíz y frijol. Esta es su  principal fuente de ingresos y es así como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar. Desea mejorar las condiciones de su casa la cual está construida  a base de bahareque y las paredes se encuentran dañadas a causa de las lluvias y el sol. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro para construir las paredes de su vivienda  lo más pronto posible.
texts.en:
Francisco lives in a very small house together with his family, which consists of his life partner, their three sons aged 9, 7 and 3, and an 11-year-old daughter. He has made a living in agriculture for a long time, primarily planting corn and beans. This is his primary source of income and how he manages to sustain his home.

Francisco wants to improve the condition of his house, which was constructed from wattle and daub. The walls have been damaged from rains and from the sun. He is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying brick, sand, cement and iron to build walls for his home as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy brick, sand, cement and iron to build walls for his home

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús es una mujer admirable quien a sus 67 años de edad no se cansa de trabajar para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ella habita en casa propia y desde hace 42 años se dedica a la venta de comida, cocteles de concha y variedad de bebidas a la orilla de la playa de su localidad. Tiene muchos clientes y es muy  conocida por muchas personas. Desea aumentar la oferta de su negocio ya que últimamente ha notado que la demanda de sus ricos almuerzos y cocteles de conchas ha crecido. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (pollo, carne, pescado, conchas, arroz, aceite, bebidas, etc.) para incrementar la oferta de sus productos. Tiene plena confianza de  recuperar la inversión con las ventas futuras.
texts.en:
Jesús is an admirable woman who is 67 years old and does not get tired of working so that she can sustain her household.  She lives in her own house and has been selling food for 42 years.  Jesús sells shellfish cocktails and a variety of beverages from her business located along the edge of the beach in her town.  She has many customers and is well-known among many people.  

Jesús wants to increase the offerings of her business since the demand for her tasty dishes and seafood cocktails has grown recently.  She is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the purchase of needed supplies (chicken, meat, fish, shellfish, rice, oil, beverages, and other items) so that she can increase her product offerings.  Jesús is fully confident that she can recoup her investment through her future sales.

loans.use: to buy chicken, meat, fish, shellfish, rice, oil, beverages, and other items.

loans.name: Trancito

texts.es: Trancito es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora. A sus 63 años de edad tiene mucha energía ya que todos los días se levanta muy temprano para realizar la venta de pollos y pan francés.
