La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su comunidad y tiene 18 años de dedicarse al negocio. Con el fin de dar mejores condicione a sus hijos, desea invertir en su negocio para aumentar su inventario y poder llegar a número mayor de clientes. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de pollos y pan francés ya que esta venta es su principal fuente de ingresos y confía poder sacar los ingresos para cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
Trancito is hardworking and enterprising. At 63 she has a lot of energy and gets up early every day to sell chicken and French bread as a street vendor in her neighborhood. She has run her business for 18 years. 

She wants to improve her children's lives by investing in her business and increasing her inventory and customer base. She has, therefore, applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy chicken and French bread; the sales of these items are her main source of income. She is confident she can earn enough money to pay her loan.

loans.use: to buy chicken and French bread.

loans.name: Wendy Maribel

texts.es: Wendy de 22 años de edad es madre soltera de una niña de 4 años de edad y habita junto a ella en casa propia. Ella se dedica al comercio de hamburguesas, tortas y variedad de bebidas. El negocio lo ha adecuado en su hogar de habitación y ya tiene dos años de experiencia en dicho negocio. Solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de pan para hamburguesas y tortas, carne, y variedad de bebidas que le permitan ampliar su oferta con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida respectivamente.
texts.en:
Wendy, 22, is a single mother of a 4-year-old daughter; they live together in her own house.  She works selling hamburgers, sandwiches and a variety of soft-drinks.  She set up her business at home and has two years’ experience in said business.

She’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy hamburger buns, sandwich bread, meat and a variety of soft-drinks that will allow her to expand her offer aiming at improving income and quality of life respectively.

loans.use: to buy hamburger buns, sandwich bread, meat and assorted soft-drinks.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de  50 años de edad habita junto a su compañera de vida y 4 hijos dos de los cuales son mayores de edad y  dos están bajo su responsabilidad económica (11 años y 13 años de edad). Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 30 años.  En su terreno cultiva mora, espinaca, cilantro y berro. Para él lo más importante es su familia y es por ella que trabaja y busca las formas de sacarla adelante. Desea mejorar el techo de su casa el cual actualmente es de teja pero se encuentra quebrada y no soporta el agua lluvia lo que provoca que sus pocas pertenencias y su familia se moje. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, polines, pines y para pagar mano de obra. Espera poder contar con este apoyo lo antes posible y hacer la reparación del techo.
texts.en:
Juan, 50, lives with his life companion and their four children two of whom are adults and two still economically dependent on him (11-years-old and 13-years-old).  He’s worked in agriculture 30 years growing blackberries, spinach, cilantro and watercress.  His family is most important to him and this is why he works and seeks ways of moving them forward.

He wants to repair the roof at home.  It’s currently tile but it’s broken and won’t keep the rain out so his and his family’s few possessions get wet.

He’s asking FUSAI for this loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, roofing purlins, screws and to pay labor costs.  He hopes to get this support as soon as possible to repair the roof.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Jesus Alberto

texts.es: Jesús de 21 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida desde hace 3 años. Desde muy joven su padre le enseño a trabajar la tierra y ahora la agricultura es su principal fuentes de ingresos. Él se dedica a la siembra de mora, espinaca, berro, etc. Y con los ingresos que saca de la venta lleva el alimento a su hogar.  Desea construir un pequeño cuarto en su vivienda pero no tiene el capital necesario para la inversión. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y lámina galvanizada. Jesús expresa tener la capacidad y responsabilidad para pagar las cuotas que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Jesús, 21, has lived in his own house with his life companion for three years.  Since he was young his father taught him to work the land and now agriculture is his main source of income.  He works growing blackberries, spinach, watercress, etc. and uses income earned from sales to provide food for his home.

He wants to add a small room at home but does not have the necessary capital for the investment.  For all the above, he’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy bricks, cement, sand and galvanized metal sheets.  He states that he has both the capacity and the responsibility to make the payments the loan implies.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to build a room.

loans.name: Santos Meybel

texts.es: Santos de 31 años de edad habita junto  a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su padre de 72 años, madre de 70 años, hermana, sobrino y primo, Habitan en casa propia desde hace mucho tiempo la cual han logrado construir con mucho esfuerzo. Santos desde hace 10 años se dedica a la agricultura principalmente a la siembra de hortalizas tales como ejotes, güisquiles, ayote, mora, etc. Su deseo es mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su familia, para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto y encementar el piso ya que en la actualidad es de tierra. Con el préstamo comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava, hierro y pagará mano de obra.
texts.en:
Santos, 31, has lived for many years with his immediate family consisting of his 72-year-old father, 70-year-old mother, sister, nephew and cousin in their own house that they’ve managed to build with much effort.  Santos has worked in agriculture 10 years mainly growing vegetables like green beans, chayote, pumpkin, blackberries, etc.  

Santos wants to make home improvements for his family and is asking FUSAI for a loan to build a room and to lay a cement floor; it’s currently dirt.  He will use the loan to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron and to pay labor costs.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Fray Oscar

texts.es: Fray es un hombre muy trabajador quien vive en condiciones muy humildes junto a su esposa. Tiene 50 años de edad y a pesar de su edad no se cansa de trabajar y llevar el sustento a su hogar. Se dedica a la agricultura principalmente al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo. Además, cultiva variedad de hortalizas como chipilín, mora y espinaca. Con la venta de sus productos saca los ingresos necesarios para cubrir las necesidades de su casa. Su vivienda es muy humilde y desea hacerle algunos arreglos ya que el piso y el techo del corredor requieren de algunas mejoras. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo del corredor y para encementar el piso de su casa. Con el crédito comprará lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena, grava. Tiene plena seguridad que con los ingresos que obtiene de la agricultura logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Fray is a very hardworking man living with his wife under very humble conditions.   He’s 50-years-old and despite his age does not tire of working to provide sustenance at home.  He works in agriculture mainly growing corn, beans and sorghum.  He also grows a variety of vegetables like ‘chipilín’ [leafy green legume], blackberries and spinach.  He earns income from the sale of his products needed to cover his household needs.

His dwelling is very humble and he wants to do some improvements because the floor and the porch roof need repairs.  He’s asking FUSAI for a loan to repair the porch roof and to install cement floors in the house.  He will use the loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, cement, sand and gravel.  He’s completely sure that he’ll be able to repay the debt the loan implies with income obtained from agriculture.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús de 58 años de edad habita en casa propia junto con su esposa y su hija de 19 años y su hijo de 16 años de edad. Es muy trabajador y admirable ya que a pesar de su edad busca las formas de llevar a su familia mejores oportunidades de vida. Se dedica a la agricultura principalmente al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo.  Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un pequeño cuarto en su vivienda. Con el crédito comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y hierro. Espera poder contar con este apoyo ya que para él lo más importante es que su familia cuente con mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Jesús is 58 years old and lives in a house he owns together with his wife, their 19-year-old daughter and their 16-year-old son. He is very hard-working and admirable; in spite of his age he seeks ways to bring his family better opportunities for a good life. He makes a living from agriculture, primarily the cultivation of corn, beans and sorghum.

In order to improve their housing conditions, he is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a small room in his house. With the loan, he will buy brick, cement, sand, gravel and iron. He hopes to be able to count on this support, as providing his family with better living conditions is his most important goal.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build a room

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan de 36 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposa  y sus dos hijos de 7 años y 13 años de edad. Desde muy pequeño aprendió el oficio de carpintería y es lo que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Tiene muchos clientes ya que se caracteriza por ser un hombre honrado, responsable y trabajador. Su vivienda es muy y desea mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su familia. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para construir dos paredes para dividir dos cuartos dentro de su casa ya que actualmente su casa consta de una sola área común. Con el crédito comprará vara de castilla, madera, bambú y lámina. Espera poder contar con el apoyo para brindar mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, 36, lives in his own house with his wife and two children, ages 7 and 13. He learned carpentry at an early age, and he provides for his family through this trade. His many clients says he is honorable, responsible, and hardworking. His wants to renovate his house and improve his family's living conditions.

He has applied to FUSAI for a loan to build two room-dividing walls in the house, as the house now comprises just one common area. He will use the loan to buy reed rods, wood, bamboo, and sheeting. He hopes that he can count on support to offer his family better circumstances.

loans.use: to buy reed rods, wood, bamboo, and sheeting.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 23-year-old single young man from Tulkram city. He lives with his family in a small, simple house. Mohammad's father is an employee in a local firm where he gets a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

Mohammad is a student in his last year at a local university, where he studies business administration. He would like to finish his study and find a job to improve the family’s conditions.

Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the university installments for this semester. By applying this loan, Mohammad will be able to complete his study, take the BA degree and start helping his family.

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Dina Santos

texts.es: Dina de 31 años de edad es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora.  Habita junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 12 años y una hija de 6 años de edad, ambos se encuentran estudiando. Dina se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas (preparación alimenticia a base de maíz). Su compañero de vida le colabora en la economía y juntos van sacando adelante a su familia. Su vivienda es muy humilde y por el tiempo el techo se ha deteriorado y es necesario cambiarlo. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para hacer el cambio del techo y dar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Dina, 31, is hardworking and enterprising. She lives with her life partner, 12-year-old son, and 6-year-old daughter. Her children attend school. Dina makes and sells corn tortillas. She and her life partner support the family financially. 

Their house is very modest, and the roof needs to be replaced, as it has deteriorated over time. She has applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to replace the roof and make her family more secure.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to replace her roof and make her family more secure.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 20-year-old single young man from Gaza city. He lives with his family in a small, simple house. Ahmad's mother is an employee in a local firm where she gets a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

Ahmad is a student in his second year at a local university where he studies business administration. He would like to finish his studies and find a job to improve the family’s conditions.

Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. By applying this loan, Ahmad will be able to write his homework and reports. This will help him to finish his studies and start helping his family.

Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Karen Carolina

texts.es: Karen de 20 años de edad reside en casa propia desde hace mucho tiempo junto con su grupo familiar. Karen se caracteriza por ser una joven muy activa, trabajadora y visionaria. Ella se dedica a la venta de variedad de ropa como: faldas, blusas, pantalones, etc. Su deseo es hacer una división para adecuar cuarto dentro de su casa ya que actualmente cuenta con una área común y para mayor comodidad es mejor construir una pared. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro para hacer la construcción de la pared y poder tener mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en: Karen is 20 years old. She has lived with her family group for a long time in their own house. Karen is known for being a very active, hard-working and visionary young woman. She works selling a variety of clothing, such as skirts, blouses, pants, etc. Her desire is to build a wall to improve a room within her home. Currently, it is a common area, but for greater convenience it is better to construct a wall. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to carry out the construction of the wall, so that she can have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to build a wall.

loans.name: Deisi

texts.es: Deisi de 40 años de edad habita junto a su  compañero de vida y  sus dos hijos de 15 y 13 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de tamales de pollo desde hace tres años y de esta forma colabora con la economía de su hogar. Su principal deseo es que su familia cuente con mejores condiciones de vida. Para ello desea invertir en la compra del derecho de agua potable la cual le hace mucha falta ya que no cuenta con el vital líquido en su casa. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la introducción del agua potable en su vivienda que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en: Deisi is 40 years old and lives with his life partner and their two children, who are 15 and 13 years old.  She has been selling chicken tamales for three years and that is her contribution to their household finances.  His main wish is for his family to have better living conditions.  To that end, he wants to buy the right to potable water, which they need very much as they do not have this vital liquid in their home.  He is asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in installing potable water, which they sorely need in their home.

loans.use: to invest in installing potable water in his home

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: Josefina de 48 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su  compañero de vida y sus hijos. Desde hace 18 años se dedica a la venta de pescado y de esta forma ha sacado adelante a su familia. Su principal patrimonio es su vivienda la cual es muy humilde y desea mejorar poco a poco. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de una puerta metálica ya que la que tiene es de madera y no es muy segura, además desea encementar el piso para lo cual necesita comprar: arena y cemento. Espera poder contar con dicha ayuda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Josefina is 48 years old. She lives in her own house with her life companion and her children. For the past 18 years she has been selling fish and getting her family ahead by doing so. Her principal asset is her house which is very modest and she wants to improve it little by little. 

Josefina is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying a metal door as the one she has is made of wood and not very secure. She also wants to cement her floors so she needs to buy sand and cement. She hopes to get this assistance as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy a metal door and cement the floor of her house.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemí de 36 años de edad habita en casa muy humilde pero propia. Es madre soltera de  un hijo de 14 años quien a la fecha se encuentra estudiando en la escuela de su localidad. Noemí se dedica a la venta de comida y golosinas en las principales zonas de su comunidad. Con el fin de brindar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su hijo, solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar arena y cemento para repellar las paredes de su casa las cuales son de adobe y con el agua se están deteriorando y además, resultan apropiadas para  que los insectos aniden. Para dar mayor seguridad a su familia espera hacer la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Noemí is 36 years old. She lives in a very small house but one that she owns. She is the single mother of a 14-year-old son who is so far studying in the school in her area. Noemí makes a living by selling food and candies in the central areas of her community.

In order to provide better living conditions for her son, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy sand and cement to plaster the walls of her house. The walls are made from adobe and are deteriorating with water. They also allow insects to nest there. To give greater security to her family, she hopes to do the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy sand and cement to plaster the walls of her house

loans.name: Florentina

texts.es: Florentina de 63 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad y le colaboran un poco con la economía del hogar. Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace mucho tiempo y de esta forma ha sacado adelante a su familia. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales desea construir una pila dentro de su casa de tal manera que pueda reguardar el agua y tenerla más cerca. Solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento y ladrillo y así poder construir la pila que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en:
Florentina, 63, lives in a house that’s her property with her children who are adults now and help out a little with household economy.  She’s worked selling tortillas for a long time and has moved her family forward this way.

Aiming at improving her living conditions, she wants to build a water tank inside the house so that she can store water and have it nearby.  She’s asking FUSAI for this loan to buy sand, cement and bricks to build the water tank she so needs.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to build a water tank.

loans.name: Cenia Ivon

texts.es: Cenia de 35 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo quien es agricultor y su padre de 67 años y dos hijas de 18 años y 8 años de edad. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y busca las formas de darle lo mejor. Desde hace 22 años se dedica a la confección y venta de ropa. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de ella ya que ofrece variedad y calidad en sus prendas de vestir. Con el tiempo el techo se ha deteriorado por lo que desea hacer el cambio lo antes posible. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, polines y pago de mano de obra. Espera poder contar con esta ayuda para reparar el techo y dar mayor seguridad a sus hijos.
texts.en: Cenia is 35 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, who is a farmer, her 67-year-old father, and her two daughters, who are 18 and 8 years old.  The most important thing to her is family and she looks for ways to give them the best.  She has been working making and selling clothing since she was 22 years old.  Many people give her good references because she offers variety and quality in her clothing items.  Her roof has deteriorated over the years and she wants to replace it as soon as possible.  She is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy sheet metal, wood beams, and to pay for labor.  She hopes to be able to count on this help to repair her roof and make her children more safe.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, wood beams, and to pay for labor to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 38 años de edad es madre soltera de dos niños de 12 y 9 años de edad. Desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de pollos, lácteos y verduras.  Es muy conocida en la zona ya que todos los días sale muy temprano para ofrecer sus productos  a sus vecinos. Habita en condiciones muy humildes y poco a poco va  haciendo algunas mejoras. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pila con baño ya que no cuenta con un lugar adecuado para lavar la ropa y los utensilios del hogar. Con el préstamo comprará arena, cemento y ladrillos.
texts.en:
Ángela is 38 years old. She is a single mother of two children, aged 9 and 12. For the past 8 years she has been selling chicken, dairy products and vegetables. She is well known in her area and every day she goes out early to offer her products to her neighbors. She lives in very humble conditions and little by little is making improvements.

Ángela is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in constructing a sink and a bathroom. She has no adequate place to wash the clothes and the kitchen utensils. With the loan she will buy sand, bricks and cement.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks and sand to build a sink.

loans.name: Maricela Del Carmen

texts.es: Maricela tiene 29 años de edad es madre soltera y reside en casa propia junto con sus dos hijos. Para ella lo más importante es que sus hijos cuenten con mejores condiciones habitacionales por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto dentro de su casa la cual ha logrado construir con mucho esfuerzo. Con el crédito Comprará ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro. Tiene plena seguridad de poder pagar las cuotas del crédito con los ingresos que obtiene de la venta de ropa (blusas, faldas, pantalones, etc.)
texts.en: Maricela, 29, is a single mother living with her two children in her own house.  For her, what’s most important is that her children have the best possible living conditions which is why she’s decided to request a loan from FUSAI to add a room in her house that’s she’s succeeded in building with much effort.  She will use the loan to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron.  She’s convinced that she will be able to make her loan payments with income earned from selling clothes (blouses, skirts, pants, etc.)

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies to build a wall.

loans.name: Awen Indah Group

texts.en:
Evaluated in the last period, the Awen Indah group decided to continue their loan with MUK. They still need the loan to increase their business and they will stop after they all have enough capital to run their businesses.
Ni Komang will use her loan to purchase three superior piglets. To reduce the cost of feeding them, she gives them a mixed feed made from various kinds of leafs, such as banana leaf. She hopes that in the next 5 months the pigs can grow to be healthy and earn a satisfactory price. All the profit will be saved for the capital of her business.

loans.use: to purchase three superior piglets for fattening

loans.name: Ulises Ernesto

texts.es: Ulises de 22 años de edad, habita junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeña hija de 4 meses de edad en casa propia. Con el fin de dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia, desea mejorar el piso de su vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y para mayor  higiene para su hija ha pensado en solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para mejorar el piso de su vivienda y cumplir su objetivo. El crédito lo cancelará con los ingresos que obtiene de trabajar como empleado en una fábrica de su localidad.
texts.en: Ulises, 22, lives in his own house with his life companion and their 4-month-old daughter.  Aiming at improving family living conditions, he wants to improve the floor in his house because it's worn down and so that his daughter will live in more hygienic conditions.  He’s thought to ask FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, sand and gravel to improve the floor and reach his objective.  He will repay the loan with income he earns working in a local factory.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es: José de 47 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Desde hace 18 años se gana la vida por medio de la pesca y de la agricultura. José se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador y responsable. Desea construir una pila con lavadero y baño para facilitar a su compañera de vida  y a sus hijas reguardar el agua para lavar la ropa sucia y utensilios del hogar. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento, ladrillo y grava que le permita hacer la construcción de la pila que tanto necesitan.
texts.en: José, who is 47 years old, lives in his own house together with his life companion and their children. For 18 years, he has earned a living through fishing and agriculture. José is characterized as a hard-working and responsible man. He wants to build a wash house with a sink and bathroom to make it easier for his life companion and their daughters to store the water to wash the dirty clothes and household utensils. He is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of sand, cement, blocks, and gravel, which will allow him to do the construction of the wash house that they need so much.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, blocks, and gravel to build a wash house

loans.name: Mirna Maricela

texts.es: Mirna de 26 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a sus hijas de 10 años y 6 años de edad. Mirna trabaja como costurera dentro de su casa desde hace 8 años. Muchas personas buscan sus servicios ya que hace variedad de prendas de vestir tales como faldas, vestidos, camisas, pantalones, etc. De esta forma mantiene la economía de su hogar y le brinda a sus hijas lo necesario para su desarrollo. Su vivienda es muy humilde pero propia la cual requiere de algunas mejoras. Por el momento el techo de su casa se encuentra dañado y cuando llueve el agua se filtra y moja sus pocas pertenencias. Además, las paredes se están lavando y deteriorando por lo que es necesario que se repellen para evitar que se arruinen por completo. Por lo anterior solicita a FUSAI este crédito que le permita comprar: lámina, clavos, cemento, grava y arena.
texts.en: Mirna is 26 years old. She is a single mother and she lives in very modest conditions with her two daughters who are ten and six years old. Mirna has worked as a seamstress in her home for eight years. Many people seek her services since she offers a variety of of garments like skirts, dresses, shirts, pants, etc. With this business, she supports her household and gives her children things necessary for their development. Her home is very modest but it is her own, so it requires some improvements. At the moment, the house's roof is damaged. When it rains, the water seeps through and dampens their few belongings. In addition, the walls are washing away and deteriorating. It is necessary to plaster them to prevent them from being destroyed completely. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI which will allow her to purchase: sheeting, nails, cement, gravel and sand.

loans.use: purchase sheeting, nails, cement, gravel and sand in order to change the roof and plaster the walls.

loans.name: Idalia

texts.es: Idalia de 41 años de edad habita junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio. Desde hace cinco años comenzó el negocio de venta de medicinas tales como: pastillas, jarabes para la tos, alcohol, etc. De esta forma logra llevar el sustento a su hogar y junto a su compañero de vida llevan la economía de su casa. Con el fin de mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de sus hijos desea reparar el piso del corredor de su vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, y grava y así poder hacer los arreglos lo antes posible.
texts.en: Idalia, who is 41 years old, lives with her life companion and their three children. She works in commerce. Five years ago she began a business of selling medicines such as tablets, cough syrups, alcohol, etc. In this way, she manages to bring sustenance to her home, and together with her life companion they manage the economy of their household. With the goal of improving the living conditions of their children, she wants to repair the floor of the corridor of their residence, since it is deteriorated. She is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, and gravel and thus be able to make the arrangements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel to cement the floor of the passageway in her home.

loans.name: Sari Kencana Group

texts.en:
Jro Nyoman and all the members of Sari Kencana group are getting their eighth loan. They decided to have the loan until they ready to run the business by themselves.

Jro Nyoman still keeps her enthusiasm to run the business. She has two children and they are still in school. Jro Nyoman has a local-breed sow. She will use her loan to purchase two piglets for fattening and feed for them. She and the other members of the group are very happy because they are still getting loans. They use the loans to purchase superior piglets and feed. Jro Nyoman spent 15,000 IDR for daily needs and 100,000 IDR for electricity.

loans.use: To purchase two piglets for fattening and feed for them

loans.name: Sumber Bunga Group

texts.en:
With the same loan, the Sumber Bunga group continues borrowing through Kiva. In addition to developing the business by buying piglets, loans were also used to buy feed and fix the cages. From the previous loan, they were able to save for working capital. The new loan will be used to develop the business. All members of the group feel very much helped by these loans because they can develop their businesses and generate revenues to improve the welfare of the family.

Wayan will use her loan to buy 2 superior quality piglets and feed. She plans to keep pigs for fattening. She’s also purchased a sow with her own money. Wayan thanks MUK, KIVA and Kiva Lenders because of their support to develop businesses and improve the welfare of families.

loans.use: To buy two superior-quality piglets and to buy feed

loans.name: Sumber Usaha Group

texts.en:
Sumber Usaha group gets their new loan from MUK. Now there are 9 members, as one member resigned from the group because she move to another village, far away from her village now. (One member couldn’t attend the meeting because of illness.) The group's new loan request is 18M IDR.  The loan will be used to buy piglets and repair cages. Ni Wayan, as the head of the group, is using the loan to buy 2 superior piglets and also feed. The price for the superior pig species is currently very expensive, ranging from 400,000 - 500,000 IDR. These pigs will be maintained for 5 months for fattening. Ni Wayan expects during the loan period the pig will be able to develop properly, without being attacked by disease. With this effort, she has a dream to fix her house.
The Sumber Usaha is a women's group. They run not only a pig business, but various kind of jobs to increase the incomes of their family, such as farming, selling at small kiosks, making religious articles, teaching, etc.

loans.use: to buy two superior piglets and also feed.

loans.name: Tukad Kemiri Group

texts.en:
Tukad Kemiri group is comprised of suburban residents who have a trading business and raise livestock.  One is raising pigs.  The group has five members and received a loan of five million IDR.

Ni Nyoman, the head of the group, is using her portion of the loan to buy three types of local pigs, which will be sold to pig bolsters (or roasters).  The pigs will be maintained for two months, and then sold again.  Profits from the sale will be set aside and the capital will be used to buy additional pigs.  

Ni Nyoman hopes this effort will go smoothly so that she can realize her dream, which is to make her kitchen more spacious.

loans.use: to buy three types of local pigs.

loans.name: Sedana Ayu Group

texts.en:
The Sedana Ayu Group receives their new loan with a change in composition of one member. One member resigned for several reasons. There’s a change in the loan size, with a total of six members, the group will receive IDR 15,000,000.

Ni Nengah and her husband work as farmers as well as being pig breeders. Ni Nengah also has side job as a chips-maker. She sells the chips from a small kiosk in her village. 

Ni Nengah will use her loan to purchase pig feed and two superior piglets for fattening. With control by the vet and the Loan Officer, she hopes the piglets will not be attacked by disease. To avoid that, she’s already sterilized the barn with chemical spray. The profit from this business will be used to increase the business by purchasing more piglets.

Ni Nengah has two children. Her first child works at the restaurant and the other child is still in school. Ni Nengah spent IDR 25,000 daily for kitchen expenses and IDR 50,000 monthly for electricity.

loans.use: to purchase pig feed and two superior piglets.

loans.name: Du's Group

texts.en:
Du was born in 1958, and she has three children. She and her husband earn their living through farming; she has done this for seven years. Her family’s total earnings are about 8,000,000 VND per month. 

Her challenge in life and work are lacking money to buy more chickens, and lacking the education fee for her children. Her dreams are her children can grow up well, and she can enlarge her chicken farm. 

This loan is one of the steps that helps her to reach this dream. She can invest in her farm to gain earnings, and save the profits for her children’s education. 

Du is a hardworking woman, and a passionate businesswoman. She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2006. In this eighth loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy food for her chickens. She always wants to expand her business, and raise her children well. 

Other members which are part of Du's group include:

Lan is 51 years old. He has two children. He is a seller. He wants to borrow 9,374,000 VND to sell paper.

Thao is 25 years old. She has a child. She is a seller. She wants to borrow 5,014,000 VND to buy clothes for her shop.

Tuyet is 38 years old. She has two children. She is a motorbike repairer. She wants to borrow 5,014,000 VND to buy motor oil for her motor repairing store.

Dung is 28 years old. She has two children. She is a farmer. She wants to borrow 6,322,000 VND to buy food for pigs.

Hien is 37 years old. She has four children. She is a seller in a market. She wants to borrow 7,630,000 VND to sell groceries.

loans.use: to buy food for her chickens.

loans.name: Sarafina Group

texts.en:
Zaina, who was born in the late 1970s, is divorced and has three children who are in school. Since 1993, Zaina has been running a business selling milk. She is working hard to see her business doing wonderfully. She works from 7am to 6pm each working day and is able to make a good profit each month.

This will be Zaina's third loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania and she will use it to buy more liters of milk to resell. She used her previous loans to buy more stock for her business and has paid back all her loans successfully. Zaina uses her profits to cover school fees and she has started building a house. She dreams that one day she will be able to finish building her house. 

Zaina will share this loan with her loan group "Sarafina" which totals six members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more liters of milk to resell.

loans.name: Survey Group

texts.en:
Amina, who is in her late 20s, is married with a boy who is in school. For four years now, Amina has been running a beauty salon business. She starts working from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. daily, and is able to make a small profit per month. 

This will be her fifth loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used her previous loans to buy the required equipment for her beauty salon, and cosmetics to resell. She has paid back all her previous loans successfully. Amina used her profits to cover school fees and household expenses. She will use this loan to buy the missing beauty salon equipment. Amina dreams to own a bigger salon. 

She will share this loan with her loan group, Survey, which totals 8 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy missing beauty salon equipment.

loans.name: Songa Mbele Group

texts.en:
Kuhayiwa, who is in her late 40's, is a widow with two children who are still at school.  She has been a tailor for fifteen years.  She has also been making mandazi (local doughnuts) for ten years now.  She works from 10 AM to 6 PM daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Kuhayiwa's fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to increase the materials to make more dresses to sell and to service her sewing machine so that she could sew quickly and  make neat dresses.  She is really happy with the loans which have made it possible for her to take care of her family without difficulties.  

With the previous loans, she also started making mandazi, which she sells to customers while they are waiting for their dresses and to people walking by.  She used the profit to pay for school fees, household expenses, and renovations on her house.  She will use this loan to  buy more baking flour, cooking oil, and charcoal  to make more doughnuts.  She dreams of finishing renovations on her house and being able to pay school fees for her children.

Kuhayiwa will share this loan with loan group "Songa Mbele," which has ten members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more baking flour, cooking oil, and charcoal  to make more doughnuts.

loans.name: Hekima Group

texts.en:
Mariam, who is in her late 30s, is single.  She has been managing two businesses: a tailoring business for three years and soft drinks since 2006. She works from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily and is able to make a very good profit. 

From Tujijenge Tanzania, this will be her second loan request, which she will use to buy tailoring materials and replenish her soft drinks. With the previous loan, which she has paid back successfully, she managed to buy one tailoring machine and more materials. 

Mariam used her profit to finish building her house and covered part of her home expenses.  She dreams of improving much on her businesses. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "HEKIMA," which consist of two members. The members of the group hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy tailoring materials and to replenish her inventory of soft drinks.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: Elizabeth es socia del grupo “Mujeres Emprendedoras” constituida por 05 socias trabajadoras que buscan mejorar cada día. Elizabeth tiene 38 años de edad, casada con 03 hijos aún dependiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza. Comenzó ofreciendo a pedidos, con lo que pudo ahorrar puso su propio local donde actualmente los exhibe. Este negocio le ha permitido mejorar su vivienda. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de perfumes, talcos, cremas y así surtir su tienda. Aperturar otra tienda de productos de belleza es su siguiente  meta. El grupo “Mujeres Emprendedoras” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Elizabeth es la segunda del lado derecho y viste casaca blanca con rojas. En la parte superior al lado izquierdo esta nuestra socia Bárbara la cual no pudo llegar a tiempo por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the “Enterprising Women” Group, composed of 5 members, all workers, who are seeking to better each day. Elizabeth is 38 years old and married, with 3 children who are still dependent. She sells beauty products, at first by taking orders, and now in order to save, she has established her own stall where she can exhibit her goods. This business has allowed her to improve her home.

The loan she is soliciting will be used to purchase perfumes, talcs, and creams to restock her store. Elizabeth's next goal is to open another beauty products store. 

The “Enterprising Women” Group is grateful to all the people who make this loan possible. In the photo, Elizabeth is the second person from the right and is wearing a white jacket with red trim. In the upper left of the photo  is our member Barbara who could not arrive on time, due to her work.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, talcs, and creams to sell.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo es un joven de 20 años que cursa el 8 ciclo de la carrera de Contabilidad. Decidió estudiar dicha carrera, pues vio que era su vocación, ya que es hábil para ello. También labora en una empresa en el área de contabilidad, generando ingresos la cual le permite cubrir algunos  gastos de la universidad. Agradece a sus padres, pues ellos fueron los que siempre lo apoyaron. Solicitó el crédito para el pago de pensiones de su universidad. Al culminar la carrera estudiar una Maestría en Tributación Y Derecho, pues él sabe que de esta manera tendrá mayores oportunidades laborales. Agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por ayudar a jóvenes como él.
texts.en:
Ricardo, 20, is in the 8th semester of his accounting program. Ricardo chose this career because it’s his vocation and he is adept at it. He also works in the accounting department of a firm to earn money to pay some of his college expenses. He thanks his parents, who have always been supportive.

He has applied for a loan to pay his college room and board. He knows that he will have better job prospects after finishing the Master in Tax and Law. He thanks Kiva lenders for helping young people like him.

loans.use: to pay room and board.

loans.name: G.s Santa Fe Group

texts.es: El Grupo Solidario Santa Fe originario de uno de los municipios del norte del occidente del país está conformado por cuatro integrantes los cuales son: Ana Cecilia, María Adelaida, Alma Suyen, y María Angélica mayores de edad acompañadas, con seis hijos aún bajo su responsabilidad los cuales los demás trabajan, todos tiene el mismo negocio que es una pulpería la cual ofrecen productos de consumo diarias como: arroz, azúcar, fósforos, café, golosinas, frijoles, aceite, detergentes, gaseosas, productos congelados entre otros más. Ana Cecilia es la coordinadora del Grupo el cual tiene la responsabilidad de traer en tiempo y forma el pago de la cuota y que puedan cumplir con sus responsabilidad negocio que tiene ya varios años y con los prestamos obtenido ha logrado incrementar más su negocio, el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en su negocio y lograr cumplir y satisfacer las necesidades que los clientes tienen. El G.S. Santa Fe agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas Kivas les ofrecen a personas de bajos recursos económicos para tener fuentes de trabajo.
texts.en:
The "Santa Fe" communal bank is from one of the municipalities in the north-east of the country. It is composed of four members: Ana Cecilia, María Adelaida, Alma Suyen, y María Angélica, all married adults who have six children who they still are responsible for. Their other children are working. All the members have the same business: Pulperias, which are small grocery stores. They sell basic household items like rice, sugar, matches, coffee, candies, beans, oil, detergents, soft drinks, frozen foods, etc. 

Ana Cecilia is the coordinator of the group who is responsible for meeting the proper payments on time, something she is quite capable of doing with her sense of responsibility. She has had her business for a number of years now and with the assistance of the loans has managed to expand it. The objective of this loan is to invest in her business and be able to meet the needs of her customers.

 The "Santa Fe" communal bank is very thankful for the support that the lenders at Kiva offer people of modest economic resources to access employment.

loans.use: to invest in working capital expanding her store with the purchase of basic household products.

loans.name: G.s. Rosa De Sharon Group

texts.es:
El G.S Rosa de Sharon está conformado por tres integrantes, madres solteras con ocho hijo bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarios de Nagarote, lugar que está ubicado en zona de occidente del país. Nagarote de caracteriza por su comida y refrescos  típica como “quesillos y tiste” estas personas  se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudieron estudiar una carrera universitaria.

Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora del G.S es Mayra y tiene por actividad económica la venta de comida casera el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación. Como comida arroz relleno, pollo en caldo, pollo frito, manuelitas, carne asada, carne molina, bistec, frijoles, maduros fritos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El G.S. Rosa de Sharon agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas Kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The G.S Rosa de Sharon Group is made up of three single mothers with a combined eight children.

They are from Nagarote, located in the west of the country. Nagarote is known for its typical food and refreshments such as "quesillos" [cheese, sour cream and onion wrapped in a tortilla] and "tiste" [cocoa and rice drink]. 

They are characterized as being hard working, responsible and with a desire to improve. Unfortunately due to a lack of economic resources, they could not study at the university. 

Thanks to her efforts and desire to get ahead, the coordinator of the G. S. Group is Mayra. She sells home cooked food. 

Her business is located in her home. She cooks foods like rice stuffing, chicken in broth, fried chicken, "manuelitas [cheese fritters], pork, ground beef, steak, beans and fried plantains. 

The goal of the loan is to invest it in working capital and aide her business in buying and selling food products so that in the near future she can have more income. 

The G.S Rosa de Sharon Group is thankful for the help that the Kiva lenders give to people with few resources and poor countries such as Nicaragua to help them have dignifying jobs.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and aide her business in selling home made food like rice stuffing, chicken in broth, fried chicken, "manuelitas [cheese fritters], pork, ground beef, steak, beans and fried plantains.

loans.name: Jazmina Ivette

texts.es: Jazmina, es Lic. de la carrera de comunicación  y relaciones públicas, labora para una empresa como asistente de comunicación, es una jovencita de 29 años de edad habita junto a su madre y en sus tiempos libres se dedica a trabajar como voluntaria en pro de los derechos humanos, labor que le apasiona mucho, pero su limitante tanto en su carrera como                                                                               el voluntariado, es el no hablar ingles, por lo que ella desea estudiar dicho idioma para mejorar aun mas sus habilidades y poder obtener mayores oportunidades profesionales, por lo que solicita el apoyo de crédito para poder hacer efectivo el pago del curso y empezar un nuevo reto para superarse.
texts.en: Jazmina has her degree in Communication and Public Relations, and works as a communications assistant in a company. She is a young woman of 29 who lives with her mother. In her free time she works as a volunteer for human rights, something she is really passionate about. But she is limited, both in her career and her volunteer work, by the fact that she doesn't speak English. So she wants to study it in order to improve her skills and be able to have better professional opportunities. She requests this loan so she can make the course payment and begin a new challenge to achieve.

loans.use: to pay education costs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her degree fees.

loans.name: Concepcion De Maria

texts.es: Concepción anhela trabajar y ser una buena profesional, en la actualidad cursa el último año de Lic. en administración de empresas turísticas y hoteleras, tiene 21 años de edad, su madre le apoya con sus gastos universitarios, Concepción con muchos esfuerzos logro reunir unos  ahorritos que su madre le daba y  con el apoyo de crédito que solicita podrá completar para pagar el curso de titulación, asi lograr ejercer su profesión.
texts.en: Concepcion yearns to work and be a good businesswoman. She is currently in her last year of studies to earn a degree in hotel and tourism business administration.  She is 21 years old and her mother helps her with her university expenses.  With a lot of hard work, Concepcion was able to scrape together the little bit of savings her mother gave her, and with the support of the loan she is requesting, she will be able to finish paying for the course she needs for her degree and achieve her goal of working in her profession.

loans.use: to pay for the final course for her degree.

loans.name: Jim Christopher

texts.es: Jim tiene 20 años, estudia la carrera de comunicación y relaciones púbicas con una duración de 4 años, el es apoyado económicamente por sus padres, ya que en la actualidad no cuenta con un empleo, tiene mucha ilusión de culminar su carrera, para ser el sustento de sus padres y contribuir al progreso en su hogar. Jim se encuentra en la etapa final de su profesión, solicita este apoyo de crédito para poder pagar el curso de titulación de su carrera, solamente de esta manera podrá cubrir este gasto que tiene un costo muy elevado y el financiamiento en cuotas es su mejor opción.
texts.en:
Jim, 20, is in a four-year communications and public relations course.  His parents support him economically since he’s currently unemployed.  He has great hopes of finishing his career to support his parents and contribute to his home’s progress.

Jim’s in the final stage of his profession and is asking for the loan’s support to pay for his final degree course.  This is the only way he’ll be able to cover this expense for it’s quite high and his best option is a loan he can repay in installments.

loans.use: to pay tuition and fees.

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga has been working as an accountant in Lyceum since 1985. There are four people in her family; she lives with her three children. Her husband married another woman. She is divorced.
 
Since last year, Olga has been rebuilding her house, and there is still some work to be done to finish it completely. Usually, she uses a coal or wood-fired stove to warm her home, but her windows don’t keep the warm in, and that’s why she wants to change the windows and doors of her house. She is asking for a loan of 7,500 somoni to buy doors and windows. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy doors and windows to help keep her house warm.

loans.name: Rano

texts.en: Rano is a wonderful woman who needs your assistance financially. She was born in 1978, is married and has 3 children. Her husband is an accountant. She has been busy sewing national dresses for many years. She also sews European style dresses. Rano sews the dresses in her house since she does not have her own workshop. She wants to build her own workshop and be able to serve her customers better. Rano is also a teacher and works at a local school. She wants to develop her business and maximize her profits. She is asking for a loan of 7,500 TJS to buy building materials for building a workshop. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy building materials for building a workshop to house her sewing business.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.en: Shoira is a student in her fourth course. She studies at the Khujand States University. She is learning bank structure. Shoira has a purpose to work in the national bank of Tajikistan. She studies well. After university classes, Shoira has language classes. She is learning English. Shoira has good computer ability and she is smart. Shoira is 23 years old. She is not married, and lives with her parents, sisters, and brother. Shoira has been working in recent months at a Microcredit Organization. She has a practice here. She is asking for a loan to pay for her tuition. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees.

loans.name: Dilrabo

texts.ru: Дилрабо трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Она родилась в 1975 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Дилрабо в ИМОН обратилась за займом в сумме 6000 сомони для того, чтобы организовать свой бизнес. Она участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она раньше занималась скотоводством. Недавно окончила курс по шитью и кройки женской одежды. Теперь она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем и продажей женской одежды, как платья и халатов. Дилрабо будет справляться с бизнесом сама. Ее муж Акбар мастер по ремонту дома. Он поддерживает идею своей жены. Дилрабо надеется на то, что бизнес у нее будет развивающимся и принесет дохода. Она запрашивает займ для покупки тканей и швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dilrabo is a hardworking and good woman. She was born in 1975. She is married and is raising three children. Dilrabo applied to IMON for a loan of 6,000 somoni in order to establish her own business. She participated in a course "Bring It On" organized by the Association of Business Women and received a certificate. She was previously involved in raising cattle. Not long ago she completed a course in sewing and cutting out women's clothing. Now, she wants to organize a business sewing and selling women's clothing such as dresses and gowns. Dilrabo will manage the business herself. Her husband Akbar is a master home repairman. He supports his wife's idea. Dilrabo hopes that the business she has will develop and bring income. She is requesting a loan to buy fabrics and a sewing machine in order to establish a new business.

loans.use: A loan of $1,275 helps Dilrabo to buy fabrics and a sewing machine to organize a new business.

loans.name: Sharofat

texts.en:
Sharofat is 56 years old, married with seven children. Being a responsible mother, she works hard every day to generate income so that she can cover her daily costs.  She has been busy with farming for more than ten years. She grows vegetables and crops. She sells her products at the local market.  She is dedicated to developing her farming business and growing rice on her own land. 

Sharofat would like to develop her business, which is why she is asking for a loan in the amount of 6,000 somoni to purchase mineral fertilizers and seeds for the new planting season. She hopes that Kiva lenders won’t reject her loan and she thanks lenders in advance for their generosity.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and seeds for the new planting season

loans.name: Marziya

texts.en: Marziya was born in 1963. She is hardworking woman. Marizya has been working in a local hospital for more than 28 years. At first she worked as cleaning woman. After some years she entered medical college and graduated successfully. Now she works as a nurse and she is good at her work. She is only provider for her family as her husband died and she is now a widow. Marziya lives with her 2 children in a small house which is in bad condition. She is asking for a loan of 2000 TJS to buy building materials such as cement and paints to repair their house. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and paints for repairing her house.

loans.name: Bibiroziya

texts.ru: Бибирозия добродушная женщина. Она родилась в 1971 года. Она более 10 лет занимается собственным бизнесом. Она имеет кафе на местном рынке, где она приготавливает национальные блюда и продает их местным торговцам, которые торгуют на рынке и во время обеда посещают ее кафе. Она приготавливает такие блюда как шашлык, плов, жареная курица и т.п. Она замужем и мать 2 детей. Бибирозия построила дом с полученного дохода. Однако она должна сделать забор вокруг ее нового дома. Она не имеет достаточно денег, чтобы сделать забор. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, кирпич и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Bibiroziya is a kind-hearted woman. She was born in 1971. For more than ten years, she has been involved in her own business. She has a cafe in the local market, where she prepares national dishes and sells them to the local traders who sell in the market and during lunch visit her cafe. She prepares such dishes as shahlik, pilaf, fried chicken, etc. She is married and is the mother of two children. Bibiroziya built her home from the earned revenue. However, she must make a fence around her new home. She does not have enough money to build a fence. She is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy building materials such as cement,  brick, and the like.

loans.use: A loan of $650 helps Bibiroziya to buy building materials such as cement and brick for making a fence.

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика вместе с двумя детьми живет в доме, который не имеет забора. Ночью ей страшно, так как она потеряла своего защитника несколько лет назад и она вдова. Малика имеет двоих сыновей. Ее сыновья данное время находятся в Российской Федерации. Они там подрабатывают разнорабочим. Малика более 25 лет работает в государственном учреждении. Она имеет высшее образование и огромный опыт работы. Она является мастером своего дела. Малика собирается сделать забор вокруг дома, однако она не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони ля покупки строительных материалов как цемент, кирпич и т.п. Она ждет ваше милосердие и благотворительность.
texts.en: Malika together with her two children lives in a home which does not have a fence. At night, she is afraid since she lost her protector several years ago and she is a widow. Malika has two sons. Her sons are currently living in the Russian Federation. They are working part-time there as laborers. For more than 25 years, Malika has been working in a state establishment. She has a higher education and a lot of work experience. She is a master of her work. Malika intends to make a fence around the house, however she does not have money. She is  requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy construction materials such as cement, bricks, and the like.

loans.use: A loan of $650 helps Malika to buy building materials such as cement and brick for making a fence.

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбар 37 лет. Она разведенная женщина. Дилбар единственная кормилица своих детей. Она 3 года назад начала свой бизнес купле продажей золотых украшений, так как она нуждалась в деньгах. Обеспечение 3 детей требует массу денег: продукты питания, одежда, обучение в школе, дополнительные уроки английского языка и компьютера. Она начала свой бизнес с нуля, то есть она не имела начального капитала вложения. Она брала в долг товар, продала и потом оплачивала проданных товаров. Ее друг помог ей в этом. Сегодня она успешно введет своё дело. Она не имеет кухню и поэтому она планирует строить кухню. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для покупки строительных товаров как цемент, кирпич, древесина и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dilbar is 37 years old. She is a divorced woman. Dilbar is the sole breadwinner for her children. Three years ago, she began her own business buying and selling gold jewelry, since she needed money. Caring for three children demands a lot of money: groceries, clothes, education in school, additional lessons in English language and computers. She started her own business with nothing, that is she did not have a starting capital investment. She took a loan of goods, sold them, and then paid for the goods sold. Her friend helped her in this. Today she is successfully running her business. She does not have a kitchen and therefore she plans to build one. She is requesting a loan of 7,500 somoni to buy construction goods like cement, bricks, wood, and the like.

loans.use: A loan of $1,575 helps Dilbar to buy cement, bricks, and wood for building a kitchen.

loans.name: Luftiniso

texts.en: Luftiniso is a poor woman from a village. She is divorced. Luftiniso has three small children. They are schoolboys. Luftiniso wants to organize her own business and find a source of income, as her children require more money day by day and they are becoming more expensive. Luftiniso wants to organize a business to sell home products. She took part in the course "To Get Ahead," organized by a women's organization and got a certificate. She will sell her goods in a local market. Her children will help her manage the business. She is asking for a loan of 1000 somoni to buy goods to organize a new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy home product goods for a new business

loans.name: Sarvinoz

texts.ru: Сарвиноз с детства мечтала получить высшее образование и работать в офисе. Она умная и начитанная девушка. Сарвиноз в средней школе училась с отличными оценками. Она активно участвовала во внеклассных мероприятиях школы. Сарвиноз данное время является студенткой 2 курса Таджикского Государственного Университета Политики и Бизнеса. Она учится по специальности менеджмента. Она имеет много друзей, и ее друзья ценят ее дружбу. Сарвиноз в свободное время помогает маме по домашним делам. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Ever since she was a child, Savrinoz has dreamed of receiving a higher education and working in an office. She is an intelligent and well-read woman. Sarvinoz received excellent grades in high school. She is actively involved in extra-curricular activities at the school. Sarvinoz is currently a second year student at the Tajik State University of Politics and Business. She is studying for a degree in management. She has many friends, and her friends appreciate her friendship.  In her spare time, Sarvinoz in helps her mother at home. She has requested a loan to pay her tuition. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for her education

loans.name: Ruhshona

texts.en:
Ruhshona is smart woman. She is divorced. She has two children and she is the only food-provider in her family. She has a higher-level degree. She is a teacher. She works as a teacher of Tajik literature. She is one of the best teachers. She has more than seven years of experience. Her parents are teachers and that’s why she also chose this profession. She likes her job. If she has some problems her parents help her. 

She has a small salary. It is not enough to improve her living conditions. She wants to repair her house. With this aim she is asking for a loan of 800 USD to buy building materials to repair her house. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair her house.

loans.name: Kobulmo

texts.en:
Kobulmo is a 62-year-old woman, divorced and the mother of three children.  

She has a high degree. For many years, she worked in chief positions. She was the manager of her region. Nowadays she is a pensioner, but  Kobulmo's pension does not allow her to provide for the needs of her family and build the new house she needs because her family is large and needs a bigger house. 

This year she is going to build a new house with modern planning. This loan will help her buy building materials to build the new house. In this way she will provide high quality of life for her family and put an end to the problems with the house.

loans.use: To buy building materials to build a new house

loans.name: Mashhura

texts.en:
Mashhura was born in 1991. She is unmarried and lives with her parents. A young and smart woman, Mashhura works as a sewer and has been sewing women's dresses for the past two years. Little by little, with the passing of time, Mashhura has developed her business. This year, she has more clients than last year because she has developed her abilities. 

Mashhura helps her parents to improve their living condition as much as she is able. She wants to buy furniture for her household, but does not have enough money to buy furniture. She is asking for a loan of 1600 Somoni to buy furniture for her household. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her household.

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назира много лет назад была молодой девушкой, которая сидела возле мастера по шитью женской одежды в ателье и изучала его работу. Сегодня она женщина в возрасте, любимая жена, заботливая мать 4 детей и опытная портниха. Назира живет и работает  столице в Таджикистана. Она гордится тем, что является столичной леди. Назира более 30 лет занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она шьет как национальные платья, так и европейские платья. Назира имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Ее муж мастер. Они живут бедно и даже в не состоянии проводить свадебное торжество своей дочери, которая скоро собирается выходить замуж. Назира обратилась за займом в сумму 5000 сомони, чтобы провести свадебное торжество своей дочери. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Many years ago, Nazira was a young woman sitting beside a master of sewing women's clothing in a studio and studying his work. Today, she is an aged woman, a beloved wife, a caring mother of four children and an experienced dressmaker. Nazira lives and works in the capital of Tajikistan. She is proud that she has become a metropolitan lady. For more than 30 years, Nazira has been involved in sewing women's clothes. She sews both national dresses and also European dresses. Nazira has her own regular customers. Her husband is an artisan. They live poorly and are not even in a position to put on a wedding celebration for their daughter who will soon be getting married. Nazira requested a loan of 5,000 somoni to put  on a wedding celebration for her daughter.

loans.use: A loan of $1,050 helps Nazira to put on a wedding celebration.

loans.name: Saylikhon

texts.ru: Сайлихону 29 лет. Она трудолюбивая женщина. Сайлихон работает в детском садике. Она воспитательница. Сайлихон одна воспитывает своего сына. Ее муж умер. Сайлихону очень трудно обеспечить сына одной. Сайлихон несмотря на все трудности хочет поднять свою квалификацию и поэтому она заочно учится в Педагогическом Институте. Она учится на последнем курсе. Ее сын учится в средней школе. Она должна оплатить за учебу своего сына в школе, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для оплаты учебы сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Сайлихону 29 лет. Она трудолюбивая женщина. Сайлихон работает в детском садике. Она воспитательница. Сайлихон одна воспитывает своего сына. Ее муж умер. Сайлихону очень трудно обеспечить сына одной. Сайлихон несмотря на все трудности хочет поднять свою квалификацию и поэтому она заочно учится в Педагогическом Институте. Она учится на последнем курсе. Ее сын учится в средней школе. Она должна оплатить за учебу своего сына в школе, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для оплаты учебы сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.

loans.use: To pay for education of her son

loans.name: Inomjon

texts.ru: Иномчон молодой и целеустремленный человек. Ему 23 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет одного несовершеннолетнего ребенка. Иномчон работает водителем. Он всегда мечтал получить высшее образование. В прошлом году он поступил в университет по специальности Бухгалтерский учет и аудит. Иномчон учится в заочное отделение. Он кредитуется повторно и имеет хорошее кредитное досье. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Inomjon is a young and determined person. He is 23 years old. He is married and is raising one minor child. Inomjon works as a driver. He always dreamed of receiving a higher education. Last years, he enrolled in a university for a degree in accounting and audit. Inomjon is studying in the correspondence department. He is a repeat borrower and has a good credit history. He is requesting a loan to pay tuition.

loans.use: To pay for education

loans.name: Nematjon

texts.en: Nematjon is an ambitious young man. He is not married and lives with his parents in a rural village. He always wanted to be an entrepreneur but he did not have enough knowledge to organize a business. He went to Russia to find a job but did not find one and returned to Tajikistan. He began to work as a worker in a workshop making flatbread. He liked this job and learned all details of his work. Now he has good experience cooking and selling flatbread. He has an idea to organize his own workshop for making flatbread. He took part in a course titled 'To Get Ahead’ and got a certificate. He is asking for a loan of 1,500 USD to buy flour, coal, and other materials for organizing a new business.

loans.use: to buy flour, coal, and other materials for organizing a new business.

loans.name: Munisa

texts.en: Munisa is 18 years old. She is not married. Munisa is a student of Pedagogical Institute of Tajikistan. She is a first course student. She has had a dream since childhood to be a good teacher and to teach youth. Munisa wants to realize her dream that’s why she entered to pedagogical institute. She studies well and takes part in all competitions. She likes to read books. She often goes to the library. Munisa must pay for her tuition but she has not money. She is asking for a loan to pay for tuition. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for tuition at the university

loans.name: Leakana

texts.en:
Leakana is 20 years old and a freshly graduated student from high school. She currently lives with her parents in Sen Sok district, a suburb of Phnom Penh. Leakana’s education is subsidized by her parents, who are market vendors selling men’s and women’s shoes. Leakana wants to pursue her education at NUM University, but she really needs enough money to support her Bachelor's programs, which last for 4 years. She mentioned that she loves finance and banking major because she aims to be a bank staff person, a position that can earn her reputation and good salary.

Since HKL provides a very special interest rate and a long loan term for student loan product, Leakana was encouraged to borrow a loan due the family’s financial constraints. She will use the loan to pay for the cost of her first academic-year program and buy materials needed to support her course. Leakana, pictured here, is committed to study hard with the funds from this loan. Her parents, who are not included in the picture, will be responsible for principal repayments.

loans.use: to pay for the costs of her first academic-year program and buy materials needed to support her course.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрат родился в 1969 года. Он разведен и имеет одного сына. Шухрат более 30 лет работает в средней школе. Он преподает информатику. Шухрат всегда мечтал, чтобы ее сын пошел по его стопам. Он отправил сына в Литву. Его сын учится в университете. Он умный и успешный студент. Шухрат должен оплатить за учебу своего сына. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 долларов США. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shuhrat was born in 1969. He is divorced and has one son. For more than 30 years, Shuhrat has been working in a high school. He teaches informatics. Shuhrat always dreamed that his son would follow in his footsteps. He sent his son to Lithuania. His son studies at a university. He is a clever and successful student. Shuhrat must pay for his son's schooling. He is requesting a loan of US$4,000.

loans.use: A loan of $4,000 helps Shuhrat to pay for the education of his son who studies abroad.

loans.name: Ran

texts.en:
Ran is a resident from Bakan district, the most populous area in Pursat province. As other villagers do, Ran is in the business of growing rice and other seasonal crops to sell. Her common-law husband is also involved in farming activities and helps her maintain their crops. This couple has two children living with them in their own home. 

Ran wants to promote their health and live in good conditions. Therefore, she has requested a loan to buy materials and pay for labor costs to build a latrine. Having a latrine to use in the household means that she and her family members can live a healthier lifestyle. She thanks Kiva lenders and Kiva partner HKL for helping low-income people gain access to sanitation and personal hygiene. HKL has provided her a special interest rate and suitable loan terms for this loan.

loans.use: to buy materials and to pay labor costs to build a latrine

loans.name: Rang

texts.en:
Rang is 34 years old, married and has two dependent children living with her and her husband in a rural village of Siem Reap province. Rang is a hardworking woman who pays much attention to taking care of her family and also helps her husband generate income by working as a construction worker, earning a wage of $5.00 per day.

Rang would like to buy a motorcycle to help with their transportation needs, but she has inadequate money. So, she has applied for a loan in the amount of 800 US dollars from HKL, a longstanding Kiva partner. This purchase will allow her to save on daily traveling costs and save enough for the family’s emergencies.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to help with the family's transportation needs.

loans.name: Kolap

texts.en:
Kolap, aged 49, is an industrious mother of three children. They are living with her and her husband in a rural village in Siem Reap Province. To make a better living, she has been running a business of farming rice and distilling white wine from her own home. She earns a net profit of $5.00 dollar per day in this business. She works long hours a day and thinks her work is going well because she is very responsible. 

To assist in bringing in additional income, her husband now works as construction worker in a far away region. Every day, her husband needs to pay for motor-taxi to travel to his workplace. Therefore, in order to save some money, she decided to apply for a loan of 900 USD dollars for the purchase of a used motorbike. She hopes this loan will support her family and enable them to gain more profit. They are very thankful to all kind of lenders who always support her family.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to support her husband in his travelling needs.

loans.name: Gilos

texts.ru: Гилос родилась в 1990 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Она в средней школе была одной из успешных учениц и всегда мечтала стать учительницей как ее мать. Она поступила в Худжандский Государственный Университет по специальности Педагогика и психология. Гилос учится на 3 курсе. Гилос планирует после окончания университета работать в средней школе ее района. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора.
texts.en: Gilos was born in 1990.  She is married and raising one child.  When she was in high school, she was one of the best students, and she has always dreamed about becoming a teacher, like her mother.  She is enrolled as a third-year student at the Khujand State University, specializing in Education and Psychology.  After graduation, Gilos plans to work in a local secondary school.  She is taking a loan to pay her tuition fees.

loans.use: to finance her education.
